loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
Hilda is a 30-year-old married woman with three children. She lives in a rural community on the island Guadalcanal in the Solomon Islands.

She has a small garden to grow cabbage and has  sold to her community for two years.

Hilda has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a spray can, and a wheel barrow for her business. She plans to use her profits to expand her garden and also meet her family's daily expenses.

She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy ferterlizer, a spray can, a wheel barrow, and garden tools.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María, a mejorada notablemente su negocio y el estilo de vida familiar, gracias a la ayuda y buena administración de créditos que Padecomsm y los inversionistas Kiva le otorgan.
Está requiriendo de un nuevo préstamo para comprar plátanos, papas, verduras, aceite, leña y gas propano, tendrá a su disposición la materia prima para preparar la venta de antojitos, espera cubrir las nuevas demandas de sus clientes.
texts.en:
María has significantly improved her business and family lifestyle, thanks to the help and good management of loans she received from PADECOMSM and Kiva investors.  

She needs a new loan to buy plantains, potatoes, vegetables, oil, firewood and propane gas, so that she will have the raw materials to prepare snacks for sale.  She hopes to meet the new demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy plantains, potatoes, vegetables, oil, firewood and propane gas, to have the raw materials to prepare snacks for sale

loans.name: Gilberto Santos

texts.es:
Gilberto, se dedica a comprar al mayoreo jugos, agua, gaseosas y otros productos, luego paga transporte para salir a vender a las tiendas de los alrededores, su negocio ha crecido con el apoyo de créditos; tiene casa propia y vive con su núcleo familiar compuesto por su esposa y cinco hijos, su esposa atiende una venta de pupusas y tortillas, a sus hijos los tiene estudiando.
Surtirá su negocio y ha solicitado un crédito para comprar gaseosas, agua, jugos, galletas, dulces, etc., tendrá mayor cantidad de mercadería para buscar nuevos clientes e incrementar sus ingresos, los cuales serán de ayuda para respaldar el pago de la deuda y cubrir necesidades básicas que hay en su hogar.
Sus ilusiones son construir una bodega para tener un inventario más surtido y comprar su propio vehículo para salir a trabajar sin necesidad de invertir en pago de transporte, de esta manera aumentar la rentabilidad de su negocio.
texts.en:
Gilberto sells juices, water, soft drinks, and other products wholesale. He then pays for transportation in order to go out and sell to the stores in the surrounding areas. His business has grown with the help of loans; he has his own house where he lives with his nuclear family, consisting of his wife and five children. His wife has a pupusa and tortilla stand, and his children are in school.

He will stock his business and has requested a loan in order to buy soft drinks, water, juices, cookies, sweets, etc. He will have a greater quantity of merchandise in order to look for new customers and increase his income, which will be helpful to him to support payment of the debt and to cover basic necessities that exist in his household.

His dreams are to construct a small store in order to have a more complete inventory and to buy his own vehicle in order to go out to work without needing to pay for transportation, increasing the profitability of his business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, water, juices, cookies, sweets, etc. He will have a greater quantity of merchandise in order to look for new customers and increase his income

loans.name: Patricia  Yamilet

texts.es: Patricia de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo,  ella posee una panadería desde hace 5 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante,  ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de harina, levadura, azúcar etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos para que junto a su esposo tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Patricia is 38 years old and lives in her own home with her husband. She has owned a bakery for five years. Her business is located in her home and has many customers. With what she earms from sales and the support of her husband, they manage to get ahead. She is requesting a loan to buy flour, yeast, sugar, etc., so that she can increase her income and have a better quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: buy flour, yeast, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Muhasin

texts.en:
Muhasin is one of Ruma’s agents and he lives in East Serang, a two hour drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. 

Muhasin is happily married man with two daughters. Muhasin owns a stall that sells daily consumer products and mobile airtime credits for his community. He joined Ruma last year because he had met a Ruma’s sales executive that came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to expand his technology business. Muhasin is a friendly and hardworking person and his community sees him as a trusted and informative mobile provider. 

As the business grows, Muhasin is hoping to get a loan from Kiva to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. Your loan will help Muhasin to improve his business and provide much needed services to the community. 

 He thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases.

loans.name: Daysi Bernaly

texts.es:
La joven Daysi de 24  años  de edad, es madre de dos hijas de edades de 09 y 11 años, vive con su esposo en su casa ubicada en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 07  años  al negocio de venta de pan, abarrotería, frescos, ropa y cosméticos también hace tamales.
Doña Daysi sus clientes son  los amigos y personas que la conocen, es una persona muy dedicada a su negocio ya este es su mayor fuente de ingresos, está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de pan, carnes, arroz, papas, sal, queso, café, harina, leche, huevos, etc. 
Doña Daysi con la inversión que realice a su negocio desea mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, uno de sus sueños es que su negocio sea más grande y que sus hijos sigan estudiando para que tengan mejores oportunidades en la vida.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2015.
texts.en:
The young woman Daysi, 24 years old, is the mother of two daughters who are 9 and 11 years old. She lives with her husband in her house located in the community of San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras. For 7 years she has sold bread, groceries, soft drinks, clothing, and cosmetics. She also makes tamales. Daysi's customers are her friends and people she knows. She is a person who is very dedicated to her business, since it is her main source of income. She is asking for the loan in order to buy bread, meat, rice, potatoes, salt, cheese, coffee, flour, milk, eggs, etc.

With the investment in her business, Daysi wants to improve her quality of life and that of her family. One of her dreams is for her business to be bigger and for her children to continue studying so that they have better opportunities in life.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2015

loans.use: to buy bread, meat, rice, potatoes, salt, cheese, coffee, flour, milk, eggs, etc., for her business

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 33 years old and married with no kids. She lives in an urban community near Honiara, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

She runs and operates a small general store selling merchandise such as canned food, snacks and other food items. She has been doing this for three years.

Margaret  requested a loan to buy house materials such as timber, Masonite and paint to improve her home. She will use part of the loan to buy merchandise for her small general store. She hopes to meet her family's daily expenses with the profit she makes with her business.

She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy timber, paint and Masonite to improve her home, and also to buy goods for her general store.

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es:
Ana, actualmente vive con tres hijos que tienen edades de 28, 24 y 18 años, solo dos de ellos dependen  de ella; hace unos ocho años se dedica elaborar tortillas para vender, oficio que heredó de su madre, trabaja de lunes a domingo y lo realiza con el fin de tener menos necesidades en su hogar.
Invertirá en maíz, leña, cal, papel y gas propano, así tendrá materiales necesarios para preparar la venta de tortillas, los productos que comprará no son perecederos por lo que continuara trabajando por un largo tiempo, pretende que su negocio tenga una productividad mayor y que la rentabilidad sea más favorable.
Sus sueños son mantener con vida su negocio y darles a sus hijos educación de calidad para que tengan acceso a un buen empleo.
texts.en:
Ana currently lives with three children who are 18, 24, and 28 years old. Only two of them depend on her. Eight years ago she started making tortillas to sell, work which she inherited from her mother. She works Monday to Sunday and she does it with the goal of having fewer needs in her home. She will buy corn, firewood, lime, paper, and propane gas. This way she will have the necessary materials to prepare tortillas to sell. The products she will buy are not perishable, so she will continue working for a long time. She hopes that her business will be more productive and that it will be more profitable.

Her dreams are to keep her business alive and to give her children a quality education so that they have access to good jobs.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, lime, paper, and propane gas. This way she will have the necessary materials to prepare tortillas to sell.

loans.name: Prudence

texts.en:
Prudence is a 47-year-old married woman with seven children. She lives in a rural community on the outskirts of Honiara, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

She raises and sells pigs in her community to earn a living and has been doing this for two years.

Prudence requested a loan to buy piglets and pig feeds for her business. She hopes to provide a better education for her children with the profits she makes with her business and also to meet her family's daily expenses.

She has been an SPBD member since 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy eight piglets and pig feeds for her piggery business

loans.name: Walter Antonio

texts.es: Walter  de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la transporte escolar desde hace mas de 4 años, tiene muchos clientes ya que es muy responsable a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo es como ha podido salir adelante el está solicitando un crédito para poderle dar mantenimiento a su vehículo y compra de llantas y así continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Walter is 39 years old and lives in his own home with family members. He has worked in school transportation for more than 4 years. He has many customers because he is very responsible when it comes to driving. He has been able to get ahead with what he earns from driving. He is requesting a loan to be able to maintain his vehicle and buy tires. This will enable him to continue working in this capacity, which is his only source of income.

loans.use: maintain his vehicle and buy tires.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge tiene 36 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa familiar con sus padres en una comunidad tranquila, donde la gente se dedica al comercio, ganadería y agricultura, se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Lagunas, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de mantenimiento y reparación de motores de autos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 3 años por lo que cuenta con clientela fija que brinda muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de nuevas herramientas para su negocio, con esto el espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge is 36 years old and single. He lives in a family home with his parents in a peaceful community where the people work in commerce, livestock, and agriculture. It is located in the Lagunas district, which belongs to the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru.

He makes a living providing maintenance and repair services for car engines. His business is located inside his home. He has been performing this work for over 3 years, and he relies on regular customers who offer him good personal and professional references. 

He is requesting a loan to buy new tools for his business. With this loan, he hopes to offer his customers better services, which will positively affect his income level, allowing him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy new tools for his business.

loans.name: Ilyas

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is Ilyas, one of Ruma’s agents. Ilyas is a young man who lives in East Serang, located about two hours drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. He owns a stall that sells mobile airtime credits for his community. He joined Ruma for almost a year and was introduced to Ruma by a Ruma sales executive who came to his stall.

He decided to join Ruma because he wants to learn about expanding his business in technology, as well as to increase his revenue and savings so that he can continue his studies at university. Ilyas is a kind and informative person, and his community sees him as a trusted and friendly mobile airtime provider. 

As the business grows, Ilyas needs additional capital and is seeking a working capital loan from Kiva lenders. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. Ilyas' goal in the near future as a Ruma agent is to provide an e-commerce service to his community, so his community can have access to better products and better prices. As seen in the photo, Ilyas is the one who is sitting. He is thankful for your kind and endless support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases for members of his local community.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María, es propietaria de una venta de tortillas y pupusas, actividad que realiza todos los días, el tiempo que lleva realizando esté negocio es de aproximadamente de tres años, lo aprendió con la ayuda de una amiga y lo desempeña con el propósito de apoyar en los gastos familiares; ella es casada, su esposo tiene 30 años de edad,  juntos tienen un hijo de 3 años de edad, por el momento se aprecia que no tiene dificultades para continuar trabajando.
Planea mejorar su equipo de trabajo, por lo que se ha decidido a solicitar un crédito en Padecoms que le será de utilidad para comprar una plancha más grande, con lo que su productividad será mayor y atenderá mejor a sus clientes, espera que las ventas aumenten junto a sus ingresos para tener mejor calidad de vida.
El objetivo que tiene María es invertir de la mejor manera el crédito y con las ganancias resarcir su deuda.
texts.en:
María owns a business selling tortillas and pupusas, an activity that she does every day. The time that she has been doing this business is about three years. She learned it with the help of a friend and does it with the purpose of supporting the expenses of her family. She is married and her husband is 30 years old. Together they have a son who is 3 years old, and at the moment she does not have any difficulties to continue working.

She plans to improve her work team, so it was decided to apply for a loan through Padecoms which will be useful to buy a bigger plate so that her productivity will be higher and better serve her customers. She hopes that the sales increase along with her income to have a better quality of life.

Maria's objective is to invest the loan in the best way and with the earnings repay her debt.

loans.use: to buy a bigger plate, so that her productivity will be higher.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
María, es casada, vive con su esposo y una hija, de 45 y 15 años de edad respectivamente, se dedica a vender frutas y verduras, con esté negocio ella puede generar ingresos con los que costea los gastos que surgen en su hogar, ya tiene 2 años con su negocio, trabaja todos los días a tiempo completo, el oficio lo aprendió de su cuñada, ya que ella es comerciante de los mismos productos.
Comprará melones, pipianes, rábanos, tomates, lechugas, fresas, guayabas, etc., al por mayor para lograr cubrir las demandas de sus clientes, sus expectativas son ofrecer productos frescos y a precios accesibles, de esta forma espera mantener estabilidad económica. 
Sus planes son continuar trabajando para reducir su nivel de endeudamiento y brindar un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María is married and lives with her 45-year old husband and 15-year-old daughter.  She makes a living selling fruits and vegetables.  With this business, she is able to generate income with which she pays household expenses.  She has been in this business for 2 years.  She works full-time every day.  She learned this trade from her sister-in-law, since she sells the same products.  

She will buy melons, squash, radishes, tomatoes, lettuce, strawberries, guavas, etc. at wholesale to meet the demands of her customers.  Her expectations are to offer fresh products at affordable prices.  In this way she hopes to maintain economic stability.

Her plans are to continue working to reduce her level of debt and to provide a better lifestyle for her family.

loans.use: to buy melons, squash, radishes, tomatoes, lettuce, strawberries, guavas, etc. at wholesale to meet the demands of her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy towels and chairs. In this way, he will be able to satisfy his customers’ needs and will continue to provide his customers with the good service that they like so much.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new paint brushes, rollers, kerosene oil and other items for her husband's whitewash services.

loans.name: Lovelyn

texts.en:
Lovelyn is a 39-year-old married woman with five children. She lives in a rural community near Honiara, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

She raises and sells chicken in her community or at her market to earn a living. She has been doing this for five years.

Lovelyn needs a loan to buy day-old chicks and chicken feed for her business. She hopes to expand her business with the profits she makes and also to help cover her family's weekly expenses.

She has been a SPBD member since 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy 100 chicks and chicken feed for her poultry business.

loans.name: Jose Eliseo

texts.es:
José, practica el cultivo de maíz y frijol, ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en desarrollar dicha actividad, lo aprendió de muy joven cuando vivía con su familia; es soltero, vive solo, pero su familia vive en la misma localidad.
Necesita de un préstamo para comprar abono, semilla, herbicidas e insecticidas para facilitar un buen desarrollo de sus cultivos de maíz y frijol, además invertirá en la eliminación de la maleza que existe en la tierra que va a sembrar, espera tener todo listo para cuando inicie a llover.
Sus aspiraciones son tener cosechas más abundantes y hacer reparaciones a su vivienda.
texts.en:
José grows corn and beans. He already has a lot of experience in this work. He learned it when he was very young when he lived with his family. He is single and lives alone but his family live in the same area.
He needs a loan to buy fertiliser, seeds, weed killer and insecticide to make it easier for his corn and bean crops to develop well. He will also invest in eliminating the weeds on the land where he is going to sew seeds. He hopes to have it all ready before the rain comes.
His aspirations include having more abundant harvests and repairing his home.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers, seeds, weed killer and insecticide to make it easier for his corn and bean crops to develop well.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Margeri

texts.es: Doña Margeri de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de medicina popular desde hace 8 años vende de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de inventario de medicamentos para incrementar su negocio  y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos y una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Margeri is 45 years old. She lives in her own home with family members. She has worked for 8 years selling popular medications on foot at various markets near her home. She is requesting a loan to purchase an inventory of drugs so that she can grow her business, thereby increasing income and improving quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: buy an inventory of drugs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy herbicides, pesticides, manure and seeds and with this material undertake his agricultural activities and with the rest pay rent for the land he works.

loans.name: Alvaro Alexander

texts.es: Álvaro de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el posee una tienda desde hace 3 años ubicada en su lugar de residencia, vende una variedad de productos por esa razón posee muchos clientes y con las ventas que realiza es como logra salir adelante,  el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como sopas, refrescos, granos básicos, aceites, etc. todo por mayor y así continuar con sus ventas para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Álvaro is 33 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner. For three years he has owned a store located in his home. He sells a variety of products and has many customers for this reason. He is able to get ahead with the sales he makes. He is requesting a loan to buy more products at wholesale prices like soups, soft drinks, basic grains, oils, etc., to continue his sales in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy more products at wholesale prices including soups, soft drinks, basic grains, oils, etc.

loans.name: Santos Eusebia

texts.es: Doña Santos de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de gas propano y tiene un de tortillería desde hace 12 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por ser un producto muy vendible, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas gas propano por mayor para seguir con su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y poder tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Santos is 64 years old. She lives in her own home with family members. She has sold propane gas and owned a tortilla factory for 12 years. Her business is located within her home. She has many customers because she sells a popular product. She is requesting a loan to buy more propane gas at wholesale in order to be able to continue with her business, which is her only source of income, and to be able to have a better quality of life along with her family.

loans.use: buy more propane gas.

loans.name: Rayhona

texts.en:
Rayhona is a capable girl. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1997. She is living in a village with her family. She is single and is not married yet. 

She grew up in the village and was taught to work in agriculture. After graduation from high school, she started to help her parents to do business in agriculture. She had a dream to be educated at university, but unfortunately their financial budget did not allow entering university. 

She decided to support her parents and participated in a three-day training provided by IMON to startup clients. She wants to help and earn for the family budget. 

She hopes someday their standard of living will be better. Recently, she asked a loan to buy calves to start doing a new business.

loans.use: to buy calves to start doing a new business

loans.name: Cindy

texts.en:
Cindy is 33 years old; she is married with four children.

Cindy works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Cindy has borrowed and paid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from food vending.

Cindy aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Rhea Mae

texts.en:
Rhea Mae is 31 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are currently in school.

Rhea Mae is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Rhea Mae has been farming vegetables for seven years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Brenda

texts.en:
From the Kitale area of Kenya, Brenda, 29 years old, has been married to her husband for 14 years and they have three children, the youngest 10  and the oldest 14 years of age. Brenda has been a farmer for as long as she has been a wife. She operates on a small piece of land under her husband's name, keeping poultry and sheep and growing crops and trees. She also has a timber-cutting business. 

Brenda is seeking a small loan of KES 30,000 to pay for farm implements. Working with modern tools will help her to work faster and more efficiently. She expects to see major improvements in the quality and quantity of yields as a result.

loans.use: To buy farm implements

loans.name: Ma. Linda

texts.en:
Ma. Linda is 31 years old with two children, ages 9 and 3. 

She and her husband operate their wholesale grocery store in their community. Their small grocery store started from a monetary gift on their wedding and through hard work, their store grew into a wholesale grocery store with three helpers. They were able to add a meat shop stall which is also patronized by their customers. Through their business they were able to improve and renovate their house.

Ma. Linda experienced a set back just recently, when a fire hit their community and burned their newly renovated house along with her store and all their possessions. Amidst the fire they weren’t been able to save anything but themselves.

Today Ma. Linda is starting again, using the payments of her regular customers who had an account in her store. She was able to buy groceries and open her business again and build her store to add some shelves. 

Ma. Linda is now requesting a loan amounting to PhP 100,000 to buy one sack of rice, one box of coffee, two boxes of noodles, two boxes of biscuits, three boxes of assorted snack foods, laundry bars and powders, and other groceries as added items to sell in her wholesale grocery.

She wanted to wholesale her groceries again, since most of her customers were not hit by the fire and still continue to place orders with her. She  also wanted to employ again her helpers, whose home was also hit by the fire.

Ma. Linda is hoping she can recover from her loss and build her home again someday for her family.

loans.use: To buy one sack of rice, one box of coffee, two boxes of noodles, two boxes of biscuits and three boxes of assorted snack foods to sell at her store

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen is 44 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Aileen is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional piglets, feed and other supplies for her business.

Aileen has been in pig fattening for seven years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets, feed and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Martha Ruth

texts.es:
Martha, elabora tortillas y pupusas para vender, de esa manera cuenta con ingresos importantes para subsistir, aprendió el oficio de amistades, en sus comienzos no preparaba mucha venta, conforme a pasaba el tiempo sus clientes han aumentado también así las demandas de sus productos, actualmente está usando un quintal de maíz diario para mantener la venta activa, lleva atendiendo el negocio casi un año.
Comprará maíz, leña, papel, bolsas, cal, etc., para tener materia prima a su disposición para seguir trabajando, un porcentaje del crédito lo utilizara para mejorar la champa en que tiene ubicado su negocio, espera fortalecer su negocio y tener más ingresos para que su familia tenga una mejor vida.
Martha anhela tener un negocio mucho más grande, con mejor vistosidad y ofrecerle a su familia un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Martha makes tortillas and 'pupusas' (a popular Salvadoran dish) to sell. In this manner, she can count on important income for subsistence. She learned the skill from friends. Initially, she didn't sell much. But with the passage of time, her customers have increased, as has demand for her products. At present, Martha is using 100 pounds of corn daily to maintain her actual sales. She has been attending her business for almost a year.

Martha will buy corn, firewood, paper, bags, lime, etc., in order to have primary materials at her disposal to continue working. A portion of the loan will be used to improve the shed in which her business is located. Martha hopes to strengthen her business and have more income so that her family can enjoy a better life.

Martha also hopes to have a much larger business, with better visibility and to offer her family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: buy corn, firewood, paper, bags, lime, etc., to have primary materials available in order to continue her work.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 33 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school.

Melanie is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Melanie requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, medicines and vaccines for her pigs. Melanie has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed twice in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Melanie would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, over-lock machine and cloth for her husband to sew clothing.

loans.name: Melagrus

texts.en:
Melagrus is a married woman with four children, two of whom are in school. she is 30 years old and a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Melagrus has a business selling fish in the Philippines and requested a PHP 3,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy boxes of fish to sell.

Melagrus has been in this business for four years. In the future, Melagrus would like to save enough money to be able to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.en:
Firuza is a generous woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1990. She is single and living in a small town with her parents. She is a responsible, goal oriented, and helpful person. She always helps her parents in the household and has a business. 

Firuza has experience in keeping livestock, which provides her family's basic income. She wants to help her parents and continue this activity. In order to have a better standard of living she appealed to IMON for financial support to buy livestock for her business. She participated in three days of training provided by IMON to startup clients and is better informed now. She hopes to be supported by KIVA lenders.

loans.use: to buy livestock for her business.

loans.name: Madina

texts.en:
Madina is a shy woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1979. She is living in a rural area where it is common to do business in agriculture. She is married and has three daughters. She has many years of practice in agriculture. She helps her husband in keeping livestock and planting agricultural products. Each year they are planting tomatoes, potatoes, cucumbers and fruits in their yard. 

The season was not well and they felt some difficulties with gaining a harvest. In order to have a better standard of living, she decided to participate in training provided by IMON to startup clients and do her own business. She is planning to buy calves, feed them and grow for further selling at an extra price. 

She is asking financial support from Kiva lenders to buy calves to start her business. She awaits Kiva and IMON's kindness.

loans.use: to buy calves to start her business

loans.name: Venancio

texts.es:
Venancio es un hombre de 47 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 3 hijos de 17, 14 y 11 años, y su negocio es la producción de estuco.
Él es buen padre, emprendedor, paciente, organizado, constante, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad ‘Vichaya’, caracterizado por sus extensos campos de cultivo, en el pasado esta zona era un campo formado por frondosos vichayos que alimentaban al ganado menor que ahí se criaba, situada al oeste de la ciudad, a una altura de 4000 metros sobre el nivel del mar, el clima es frío durante todo el año, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 7-16 grados centígrados.
Venancio es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultural general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al mismo trabajo y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela. Viven en una casa propia construida de adobe con techo de calamina, que cuenta con energía eléctrica, no tiene agua ni alcantarillado. Su negocio es la producción de estuco. El estuco grano fino mescla de cal apagada, mármol pulverizado, yeso, pigmentos naturales, etc. Y se endurece al ser mesclada con agua. Se utiliza para revestir paredes y techos, “Inicié mi actividad buscando trabajo en la comunidad, conocí a mi pareja y juntos trabajamos en el negocio…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que sus clientes demandan el producto, la desventaja es la falta de agua y combustible para trabajar.  Su sueño es construir su casa de ladrillo, él desea invertir en su negocio mediante la compra de leña y combustible para la explotación de estuco. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 20 años que desarrolla esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Venancio solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña y combustible para la explotación de estuco y con los beneficios construir una casa de ladrillo.
texts.en:
Venancio is 47 years old.  He lives with his partner, and has 3 children who are 17, 14, and 11 years old.  His business is the production of stucco.  

He is a good father, enterprising, patient, organized, consistent, responsible, and very hard-working.  His business is located in the community of "Vichaya", characterized by its extensive fields.  In the past, this area was a lush field made up of native plants called "vichayos" that fed the cattle that were raised there.  It is located west of the city, at an altitude of 4000 meters above sea level.  The climate is cold year-round, with a temperature that varies during the day between 7-16 degrees Celsius.  

Venancio is of dark complexion, brown eyes, short black hair, short stature, and thin physique.  His mother tongue is Aymará, which is spoken in the area and he speaks Spanish in the community and for business.  He lives with his partner who is engaged in the same work and with his children who are in school.  They live in their own house built out of adobe with a corrugated metal roof which has electricity, but does not have water or sewer.  His business is the production of stucco.  Fine-grained stucco is a mix of slaked lime, pulverized marble, plaster, natural pigments, etc, and it hardens when mixed with water.  It is used for covering walls and ceilings.  He states: "I began my work looking for work in my community, I met my partner and together we work in the business."  The advantage of his business is that his customers demand the product; the disadvantage is the lack of water and fuel to work.  

His dream is to build a brick house.  He wants to invest in his business through the purchase of firewood and fuel for the production of stucco.  This is his first loan cycle with the institution in the 20 years that he has been doing this work independently.  It is for these reasons that Venancio requests a loan for the purchase of firewood and fuel to produce stucco and with the profits to build a brick house.

loans.use: to purchase firewood and fuel to produce stucco and with the profits to build a brick house.

loans.name: Relyn

texts.en:
Relyn is 25 years old, married, and has four children. She want to earn a living and be able to help her husband as a farmer in providing for her family. 

She engaged in a banana production to earn income. She aims for a better income, so she decided to borrowed a loan at GDMPC to purchase fertilizer for the banana plants to produce a good harvest and have more bananas to sell in the market to gain more income.

Relyn plans for the future to save money out from her business.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer for the banana farm.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 59 years old and married with seven children. With one child still in school, Alicia works very hard to provide for her family.

Alicia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like canned goods, snack foods, candies, biscuits and noodles to sell.

Alicia has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like canned goods, snack foods, candies, biscuits and noodles to sell.

loans.name: Neranda

texts.en:
Neranda is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Neranda is 38 years old and has six children who are in school.

Neranda has a fish vending business in the Philippines and requested a 4,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Neranda has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.en:
Luis Enrique is 25 years old, married, and has two small children. 

He works as a driver in a transportation company but is asking for a loan to buy home products such as kitchen ware and sell them to neighbors and friends on weekly payments. He says that his parents use to work this way and were pretty successful, and that this will help him as an additional source of revenue. 

Luis Enrique describes himself as self sufficient and hard working.

loans.use: To buy home products for catalog sales.

loans.name: Ma. Betzabe

texts.en:
Ma. Betzabe is 55 years old and married with 10 children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Ma. Betzabe runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future Ma. Betzabe would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Percy

texts.es:
Percy, es un joven estudiante que vive junto a sus padres y 6 hermanos (4 hermanos y 2 hermanas).Él es el quinto hermano. Su padre no trabaja y su madre trabaja como personal de limpieza, lo que ocasiona ciertos obstáculos debido a la difícil situación económica familiar.

Él está cursando el IV Semestre de la Carrera de Electrónica Industrial, aún le falta por estudiar 6 meses para convertirse en un gran profesional en Electrónica Industrial. Él escogió esa carrera porque es muy rentable en la industria y con alta demanda, brinda servicios de mantenimiento y reparación de equipos electrónicos industriales.

A Percy le gusta mucho su carrera porque siente que le dará una mejor vida tanto a él como a su familia y así brindar un buen servicio a la comunidad.

De no tener acceso al crédito, Percy se hubiera retirado de SENATI, frustando sus sueños de convertirse en un excelente profesional. Por tal motivo, recurre al apoyo de KIVA para continuar estudiando y no truncar sus sueños.

Él está muy agradecido con la oportunidad que le brinda KIVA ya que, gracias a ellos puede continuar estudiando y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
Percy is a young man and student who lives with his parents and 6 siblings, (4 brothers and 2 sisters). He is the 5th sibling. His father does not work and his mother works as a janitor, which causes certain obstacles due to their difficult financial situation.

He is in his 4th semester of his career in Industrial Electronics. He still needs to study for 6 more months to become a great professional in Industrial Electronics. He selected this career because it is profitable in the industry and in high demand, to provide maintenance services and repair electronic equipment in factories. Percy likes his career a lot because he feels it will allow him to have a better life, for him and for his family and this way provide a good service to the community.

If he did not have access to the loan, Percy would have to leave SENATI, ending his dreams of becoming an excellent professional. For this reason, he requests Kiva’s support to continue with his studies and not give up on his dreams. He appreciates the opportunity from Kiva because it will allow him to continue studying and to support his family.

loans.use: to pay the remainder of his tuition in Industrial Electronics so that he can finish his degree and become an excellent professional

loans.name: Noriko

texts.en:
Noriko is 23 years old and single. She wants to help her parents with their living, so she engaged in banana production to earn a living.

As a single, she is always dreaming for a better life for her parents, so she borrowed a loan to purchase fertilizer for her banana farm to result in a good harvest and have plenty of bananas to be delivered in the market.

Noriko plans for the future to invest in other businesses out of the income of her banana production.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for banana farm

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
This is Nida. She is 56 years old already and is married also to a tailor, Eligio. She currently operates a tailoring business.

With insistence and faith, she is really determined to help her husband in sustaining the household.  Having been into the business for 39 years now, Nida is confident with her expertise and skills. 

She would preferably like to avail herself of a loan amounting to 15,000 PHP. Nida will use this to buy more raw materials for tailoring like threads, silks, fabrics and other related materials. This would be a big help for her and to the family since she will be able to weave more clothing materials through the more materials provided. 

Nida is hopeful that you’ll be able to help her in this matter.  She dreams someday to have a successful life for her family. As of now, she’s striving to earn money for her children’s education.

Nida meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, and this is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for tailoring like threads, silks, fabrics and other related materials

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel,  tiene la edad  de 41 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y sus hijos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol que tenga un buen desarrollo y una cosecha sana y de buen rendimiento, fertilizantes orgánicos que mejoren el suelo y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en la preparación del terreno y algunos trabajos de conservación de suelos para que tengan mucha erosión por el agua de lluvia y para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Miguel is 41 years old, married, and lives with his wife and their children, who are his top priority. With the loan he plans to purchase bean seeds that will have good development, a healthy harvest, and a good output. He will also buy organic fertilizer that will improve the ground, as well as other products to apply to his cultivated land. In addition, he will pay labor costs for the preparation of the land, some conservation work for rainwater erosion, product application, and assistance on the farm once it has good development. In this way he will ensure the job is done well.

He hopes to take advantage of the zone’s good conditions for this crop, and also to put into practice his several years of experience in managing grains and to purchase better products of higher quality so that the farm will have good development and health, as well as a sufficient harvest and an important production in the short run.

He wants to use the income that he hopes to obtain from the harvest for the wellbeing and education of his family, to accomplish some family goals, and to continue investing in farming. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any other loans with state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has given him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant beans.

loans.name: Dubin

texts.es: Dubin,  tiene la edad  de 38 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y sus hijos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol y de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en la preparación del terreno y algunos trabajos de conservación de suelos para que tengan mucha erosión por el agua de lluvia y para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Dubin, who is 38 years old, is married and lives with his wife and children who are his major priority.

With this loan, Dubin intends to buy bean seeds, fertilizers, and other products to apply to the planting, and to pay for laborers to prepare the land and to do some work to conserve the soil.  This is needed because the rains have caused much erosion. Also he needs the workers to assist in planting, once the fields are prepared. In this manner, he believes, good results will be assured.

What Dubin intends is to take advantage of the good climate and soil so typical of the zone for this crop and, also, to purchase the products of the highest quality, so that his crop  can develop well and healthily, like those of a worthy harvest, so that his fields will enjoy significant productivity in a short while.

Dubin also hopes to use the income he expects to obtain from this harvest for his family's wellbeing, while achieving some family goals and continuing to invest more in future harvests.

 This is the first loan Dubin has received through FUDECOSUR. He has received no other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR is prepared to offer him the best loan facilities and the lowest interest rate.

loans.use: to prepare his fields for planting beans, and to halt erosion, and to work for the conservation of the land.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 61 years old and has eleven children. She is married and three of her children are in school.

Aida is in an agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested an 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds, vitamins and to renovate her pigpens.

Aida has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.  In the future, Aida would like to save enough money so she continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and renovate her pigpens

loans.name: Lucia Miladi

texts.es: Doña lucia de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de tamales y antojitos desde hace 10 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ventas que se realiza lograr solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, pollos, verduras, etc. para continuar con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Lucia, 58 years old, lives in her own house with her family group. She has worked selling tamales and appetizers for the last 10 years. Her business is located in her place of residence. With the sales she carries out, she achieves covering some expenses of her home. She is applying for a loan for the purchase of corn, chickens, vegetables, etc. to continue with her work and therefore have better income.

loans.use: to buy corn, chickens, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven  quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 23 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de semillas de marañón, tiene 3 años de experiencia en las ventas, vende de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados, la joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas de marañón por mayor y así continuar con su trabajo para poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
The young woman whose face has been pixelated is 23 years old and lives in a high-risk zone. She earns her living selling cashew nuts. She has three years of experience in sales. She sells cashews as a street vendor in different markets. 

The young woman lives with her family group in a house that they own. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of cashew nuts at wholesale so that she can continue her work in order to have better economic income.

loans.use: to buy cashew nuts at wholesale

loans.name: Gs Superacion Group

texts.es:
El Señor Teofilo tiene 60 años de edad, es padre de cinco   hijos, convive con su compañera de hogar. Su actividad es la caficultura el también cuenta con Ganado.
Don Teofilo su sueños es mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, con el crédito que esta solicitando podrá obtener una planta solar para iluminar su hogar, Don Teofilo siempre ha soñado en tener energía eléctrica en su casa este sueño esta por hacerlos realidad gracias a Microfinanciera Prisma de Honduras y KIVA.
Don Teofilo se ha unido a otros 2 amigos para solicitar el crédito para plantas solares, ellos tambien se dedican a la caficultura Wilmer y Alfonso. 

Trojes, Honduras Abril 2015
texts.en:
Teofilo is 60 years old. He is the father of five children; he lives with his common-law wife. His activity is coffee growing; he also has cattle.

Teofilo's dream is to improve the living conditions of his family. With the loan that he's applying for, he will be able to obtain a solar panel to illuminate his home. Teofilo has always dreamed of having electricity in his house. This dream is about to become a reality thanks to Microfinanciera Prisma de Honduras and Kiva. 

Teofilo has united two other friends to apply for the loan for solar panels. Wilmer and Alfonso also work at coffee growing.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel for his home.

loans.name: Edin Yoani

texts.es:
Edin es un productor de café que vive en una comunidad rural al norte de Nicaragua. Vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos en una finca de 7.1 hectáreas, de las cuales 2.11 hectáreas ha destinado para el cultivo del café, el cual maneja bajo procesos de certificación de comercio justo.

Para este año, este productor está solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar los insumos que requiere su cafetal, para lograr una buena cosecha este ciclo. Para los próximos años, él se ha propuesto mejorar las condiciones de su finca a fin de obtener  mayores ingresos para dar un nivel de vida más digno a su familia. 

Este pequeño productor, está seguro que con las inversiones que haga en su cafetal podrá ir mejorando también las condiciones económicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Edin is a coffee producer who lives in a rural community in the north of Nicaragua. He lives with his wife and their two children on a farm of 7.1 hectares, of which 2.11 hectares have been destined for growing coffee, which is operated under fair trade certification processes.

For this year, this producer is applying for a loan that will allow him to buy the supplies that his coffee farm requires to achieve a good harvest this cycle. For the coming years, he has proposed improving the conditions of his farm with the goal of obtaining better income to give a more dignified level of life to his family.

This small producer is sure that with the investments made in his coffee farm, he will also be able to go improving the economic conditions of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers that his coffee farm requires and to assure good production.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 28 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un tienda desde hace 4 años ubicada en su lugar de residencia, también se dedica a la agricultura, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de refrescos, granos básicos, leche, huevos, café etc. Y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
This young woman is 28 years old and lives in a high-risk area. For these reasons, her face has been blurred in the photo.

She has been running a grocery store from her home for the past four years. She also works in agriculture. She has many customers because of the variety of products that she sells. With her sales, she manages to cover some of her household expenses. 

She is requesting a loan to buy sodas, basic grains, milk, eggs, coffee, and the like so that she can improve her income.

loans.use: to buy sodas, basic grains, milk, eggs, coffee, and the like.

loans.name: Jacinto Humberto

texts.es: Jacinto de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad, tiene más de 3 años de experiencia e inicio su negocio con capital propio, con las ventas que realiza es como ha podido salir adelante, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de granos básicos, huevos, refrescos, leche, café, etc. todo por mayor  y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jacinto, 41 years old, lives in his own house with his family group. He has a store where he sells staple goods. He has more than 3 years' experience and started his business with his own capital. With the sales he carries out, this is how he's been able to get ahead. He is applying for a loan for the purchase of basic grains, eggs, soda, milk, coffee etc. all in bulk and therefore be able to have better economic income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, soda, milk, coffee etc. all in bulk.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Doña Ana de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee desde hace 15  años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana, 55 years old, lives in her own house with her family group. For the last 15 years, she's had a small store located in her place of residence. She has many customers because of the good prices and the friendliness she has at the time of selling. With the profits she obtains, she achieves getting ahead. She is applying for a loan to be able to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, sodas, snacks, sweet breads, etc. and therefore be able to have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, sodas, snacks, sweet breads, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more inventory like yucca, potatoes, corn, vegetables, meats, and more

loans.name: Progresando Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “PROGRESANDO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Santa Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Norma ella es soltera y tiene 40 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de restaurant, la socia prepara diferentes platos como pollo con papas, sopas y saltados de carnes, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia, la socia ya tiene 10 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, carne y verduras.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de ganadería, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the Progresando communal bank. This bank is located in Santa Cusco district, which is part of Cusco province and Cusco department. 

The member is Norma. She is single, 40 years old, and has 2 children. The member works in her restaurant business. She prepares different dishes such as chicken with potatoes and meat soups and stir-fries. The member is an enterprising and hard-working woman who, through this business, wants to get her family ahead. She has been in this business for 10 years, and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her restaurant business. The member asks for the loan to purchase products for cooking such as chicken, meat and vegetables. 

The other members work at a business selling animals, an animal husbandry business, a grocery store business and a restaurant business.

The member is grateful to those who form part of this dream through this platform and promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy products to cook like chicken, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SAN FRANCISCO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dora ella es soltera y tiene 43 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes y restaurant, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas.

Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de ganderia, negocio de venta de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de ropa.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are members of the "San Francisco" communal bank, which is located in the district of Urcos, belonging to the province of Quispicanchis and department of Cusco.

Dora is single and 43 years old. She works at her grocery store and restaurant business, selling products of basic need like rice, sugar, milk and crackers. She wants to get ahead through this business and is an enterprising and hardworking woman. Her dream is to expand the grocery store business. She is asking for the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and crackers.

The members in the photo attached took the picture after the meeting because they asked permission since they were working. 

The other members make a living by raising cattle, selling animals, with a grocery store business and a business selling clothing.

Dora wants to thank those who form part of this dream by this means and she promises to make her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and crackers

loans.name: Mamatbek

texts.ru: Маматбек, 49 лет, женат, 3 сыновей. На протяжении 15 лет он занимается торговлей мыло-моющими изделиями и товарами широкого потребления для дома. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет 54,000 сом (KGS). Он решил увеличить свой бизнес, поэтому обратился в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку товара для расширения ассортимента. На свои доходы от кредита Маматбек хочет и дальше улучшать бизнес, он мечтает открыть собственный магазин на крупнейшем рынке страны - "Дордой".
texts.en: Mamatbek is 49, married, and has three sons. He has been selling cleaning and home products for 15 years. He earns 54,000 som (KGS) per month. He decided to expand his business, so he turned to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) in order to buy goods and expand his inventory. Mamatbek wants to use his earnings from the loan to continue to improve his business. He dreams of opening his own store at “Dordoi,” the largest market in the country.

loans.use: to purchase retail goods for his shop in order to increase his inventory

loans.name: Daniel De Jesus

texts.es: Daniel de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar,  él se dedica a la venta de joyas desde hace 12 años su negocio está ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada, gracias a su trabajo es como ha podido salir adelante,  el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas joyería por mayor como pulsera, anillo, cadenas, etc. para continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos  y así  tener  junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Daniel, 45 years old, lives in his own house with his family group. He has worked selling jewelry for more than 12 years. His business is located near his place of residence in a very busy zone. Thanks to his work, he's been able to get ahead. He is applying for a loan to buy more jewelry in bulk like bracelets, rings, chains, etc. in order to continue with his work since this is his only source of income and therefore, to have a better quality of life with his family.

loans.use: to buy more jewelry in bulk like bracelets, rings, chains, etc.

loans.name: Noe

texts.es:
Noé, está acompañado y tiene un hijo, todos comparte la misma casa; trabaja todos los días en su taller de estructuras metálicas elaborando puertas, ventanas, balcones, etc., por el momento cuenta con un buen equipo de trabajo, su horario de trabajo es según sea la demanda.
Invertirá en tubos, láminas, pintura, hierro y electrodos, para elaborar las piezas metálicas que sus clientes le han encargado, espera mejorar la calidad de sus trabajos y así ganar mayor popularidad en su localidad y sus alrededores.
Sus aspiraciones son tener los recursos necesarios con los que pueda apoyar a su hijo para que se supere académicamente.
texts.en:
Noé is partnered and has one son. All share the same house; he works every day in his metallic structures workshop making doors, windows, baloncies, etc. For the moment, he has a good work team, his working schedule is according to demand.

He will invest in tubes, sheet metal, paint, iron and electrodes to make the metallic pieces that his clients have ordered from him. He hopes to improve the quality of his work and therefore earn more popularity in his locale and its surroundings.

His aspirations are to have the necessary resources with which he can support is son so that he can improve himself academically.

loans.use: to invest in tubes, sheet metal, paint, iron and electrodes to make the metallic pieces that his clients have ordered from him.

loans.name: Anara

texts.ru: Анара, 44 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. У нее высшее образование, на протяжении 3 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Анары есть 7 коров и 12 овец, также у нее есть 2,0 ГА поливной земли, на которой она выращивает люцерну.  Анара решила развить свой бизнес и обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма. Анара намерена и дальше развивать ее дело.
texts.en: Anara is 44, married, and the mother of four children. She has a university degree and has been planting crops and raising livestock for three years. She currently has seven cows and 12 sheep, along with a 2.0 hectare plot of land where she grows alfalfa. Anara decided to develop her business and applied for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy livestock for fattening. Anara intends to continue developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock for fattening

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en:
Nargis is a 49-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of six children. One of her brothers has been living with her and has been contributing for household expenses.

Nargis has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her brother. He is a shoe maker and very expert in his profession. He has been sewing shoes for many years and therefore has a lot of experience in his profession. He sews shoes made of leather and Rexine with a sewing machine; after that, he uses hand stitching to attach the soles. In this way he is generating income for the family.

Nargis has requested a loan for her brother so that he can buy a sewing machine and initial raw materials such as Rexine, leather, thread, nails and rubber soles for making shoes.

Nargis thanks Kiva, Kiva lenders, and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and initial raw materials such as Rexine, leather, thread, nails and rubber soles for making shoes.

loans.name: Maria Cruz

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tamales de elote y de gallina desde hace 6 años, vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, pollo, azúcar, elotes, etc. todo por mayor,para seguir elaborando los tamales y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Maria lives in her own house with her family group. She has been working making and selling corn and chicken tamales for the last 6 years. She sells on foot around the different neighborhods. With the sales she carries out, she achieves covering some expenses of her home. She is applying for a loan to buy corn, chicken, sugar, corn on the cob, etc. all in bulk in order to continue making the tamales and therefore be able to have better economic income.

loans.use: to buy corn, chicken, sugar, corn on the cob, etc. all in bulk.

loans.name: Gs Vision Al Futuro Villa Nueva Group

texts.es:
El Señor Maximino tiene 36 años de edad, es padre de 3  hijos, convive con su compañera de hogar, Su actividad es la producción y  venta de café cuenta con más de 8 años de dedicarse a esta  actividad este producto lo vende a intermediario en el municipio de Trojes al oriente de Honduras, el cual le genera sus ingresos.
Don Maximino está agradecido con la institución ya que los créditos que se le han otorgado han sido de provecho y ha tenido un crecimiento en su producción.
Don Maximino con el crédito que está solicitando le contribuirá a tener una mayor producción de sus productos y con mejor calidad ya que comprara abono y fertilizantes, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares y compromisos financieros.
Don Maximino su sueños es mejorar las condiciones de vida de él y toda su familia.
Los demás integrantes de grupo se dedican también a la caficultura y lo integran; Santos, Belky, Oscar y Mario.
                                                                                

Trojes, Honduras Abril 2015
texts.en:
Maximino 36, is the father of 3 children. He lives with his common-law wife. His activity is the production and sale of coffee. He has more than 8 years' experience dedicating himself to this activity. He sells this product through a middleman in the municipality of Trojes in the east of Honduras, which generates his income.

Maximino is thankful for the institution since the loans it has granted him have been profitable and he's had growth in his production.

Maximino, with the loan that he is applying for, will contribute to having better production of his products and with better quality, since he will buy manure and fertilizers. This will allow him to improve his income to cover the family expenses and financial obligations.

Maximino's dream is to improve the living conditions of himself and of all of his family.

Santos, Belky, Oscar and Mario make up the remaining members of the group and they also work in coffee growing.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers for his farm.

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es:
Concepción, necesita de un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en la ganadería, comprara una vaca paria, para tener la oportunidad de mejorar la producción de lácteos, pues ve en la inversión la manera de tener ingresos extras para cubrir necesidades familiares sin problemas.
Con el préstamo anterior se ha mantenido trabajando en su negocio, las circunstancias familiares se mantienen y tiene estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Concepción needs a new loan in order to be able to invest in livestock. She will buy a calved cow so she can have the opportunity to improve her production of dairy products. In this investment, she sees a way to have extra income to cover her family's needs without problems.

With the previous loan she has kept her business going, maintained her family's situation, and had economic stability.

loans.use: to buy a calved cow in order to have the opportunity to improve her production of dairy products

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
Guadalupe es una mujer muy trabajadora que día con día lucha para darle a su familia lo mejor, ella está muy agradecida porque gracias a al crédito ella pudo comprar sus verduras y fertilizantes, y ahora su negocio ha prosperado como también su cultivo ha incrementado, la calidad de vida de su familia ha mejorado, pero ella quiere seguir superándose por tal razón nuevamente solicita un préstamo para poder comprar sus fertilizantes y semillas de cebolla, para seguir aumentado su cultivo.
El gran sueño de Guadalupe es poder dejarles una buena herencia a sus hijos para que ellos vivan mejor.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is a very hardworking woman who day by day, fights to give her family the best. She is very thankful because thanks to the loan, she was able to buy her vegetables and fertilizers. Now her business has prospered as well as her crop has grown. Her family's quality of life has improved, but she wants to continue improving herself. For this reason, she newly applies for a loan to be able to buy her fertilizers and onion seeds, to continue increasing her crop.

Guadalupe's great dream is to be able to leave a good inheritance to her children so that they can live better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and onion seeds.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia, está teniendo resultados positivos al haber invertido el crédito anterior en su negocio, mantiene el mismo núcleo familiar y las circunstancias económicas han mejorado un poco.
Sus demandas han crecido y necesita de un nuevo crédito para comprar leña, maíz y una plancha más grande para elaborar las tortillas, pupusas y antojitos, está nueva inversión le permitirá almacenar materia prima para trabajar durante el invierno, además la productividad será mayor, confía en que las ventas se mantengan y así poder recuperar la inversión con mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Patricia is having positive results after investing in her business with the previous loan.  She has the same family unit and the economic circumstances have improved a little.  Her needs have grown and she needs a new loan to buy firewood, corn and a bigger flat grill to make tortillas, pupusas and traditional food.  This new investment will allow her to store raw materials to use during winter, her productivity will also be higher. She trusts that the sales will be steady and recover the investment with higher profits.

loans.use: o buy firewood, corn and a bigger flat grill to make tortillas, pupusas and traditional food.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: EL ES UN JOVEN CASADO SU ESPOSA UN DIA AMANECIO CON UN FUERTE DOLOR EN EL ESTOMAGO EL CUAL FUE EMPEORANDO, LA LLEVO AL MEDICO Y LE DIJO QUE NECESTABA URGENTEMENTE OPERARSE LA VESICULA,EN EL HOSPITAL DE GOBIERNO NO QUISIERON ATENDERLA POR LO QUE REQUIRIO UN HOSPITAL PRIVADO DONDE FUE ATENDIDA, SIN EMBARGO CONTRAJO UNA DEUDA MUY FUERTE QUE DEBIO A SU ECONOMIA FAMILIAR NO HA PODIDO SOLVENTAR.
texts.en: This young man is married.  One day his wife woke up with severe stomach pain that got worse.  He took her took her to the doctor and they were told that she needed emergency gallbladder surgery.  The government hospital did not want to admit her, so they were required to go to a private hospital that would accept her.  As a result, they acquired a very large debt that the family’s financial situation is not able to handle.

loans.use: to pay for his wife's gallbladder surgery.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es:
Domingo es padre de familia de 38 años de edad, es soltero tiene una linda familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 7 y 10 años, esta humilde familia vive en una aldea denominada Xejuyup.
Para Domingo generar sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia es muy importante es por ello que se dedica al cultivo de almacigo para luego venderlos, Domingo  desde hace cinco años realiza esta labor, su segunda actividad es trabajar de jornalero con los vecinos de la comunidad.
En estas épocas de lluvia es muy importante tener la casa con más seguridad, pues las fuertes lluvias causan muchos daños, es por eso que Domingo ahora ha decido cambiar el techo de su casa, a pesar de ser un hombre muy trabajador hasta ahora no le ha sido posible cambiarlos, por tal razón solicita un préstamo para comprar líneas de láminas.
El gran sueño de Domingo es poder comprar un terreno  en la orilla de la carretera para construir una casa.
texts.en:
Domingo is a 38-year old single father of a beautiful family of two children, ages 7 and 10.  This humble family lives in a village called Xejuyup. 

For Domingo, generating his income and bringing up his family are very important. It is for this reason that he cultivates copperwood to sell, he has been doing this for the past five years. His second job is working as a day laborer in the community with his neighbors.

In these rainy seasons, it is very important to keep the house safer since the heavy rains cause a lot of damage. That’s why Domingo has decided to change his roof. Despite being a very hard-working man, up to now it has not been possible to change it. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to purchase sheet metal.

loans.use: to purchase sheet metal to remodel the roof of his house.

loans.name: Zul'fiya

texts.ru: Это женщина Зульфия. Ей 55 года. Зульфия живет на районе Дж.Руми. Она замужем. У нее один сын и одна невестка. На протяжении многих лет Зульфия сделала решений выпечки и продажи лепешки. Она  8 лет занимается бизнесом. Она печет вкусные, красивые  и традиционные лепешки. Ее сын продает хлеб на рынке. Зульфия занимается бизнесом у себя дома и имеет много клиентов. Ее лепешки хорошо знаменит своими вкусами и запахами. Она просит кредит, чтобы купить мука, соль и дрова, чтобы испечь лепешки. Это кредит поможет ей сохранить бизнес и продвигать на новый уровень.  Вы можете поддержать ее сейчас!
texts.en: This woman is Zul’fiya. She is 55 and lives in the J.Rumy district. She is married and has a son and daughter-in-law. She has been baking and selling lepeshki bread for eight years. She bakes delicious and beautiful traditional lepeshki. Her son sells bread at the market. Zul’fiya runs her business from home and has many customers. Her lepeshki are well known for their taste and smell. She requested a loan to buy flour, salt and firewood so that she can continue baking. This loan will help her keep up her business and expand to a new level.
