Beatriz has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her business

loans.name: Henry Antonio

texts.es:
Henry es un pequeño caficultor de 46 años de edad. En su finca cuenta con 3.52 hectáreas de café, el cual trabaja desde hace 10 años. Además del cultivo de café, también se ha dedicado a la producción de granos, frutas y musáceos; con las que ha logrado mantener una finca con diversidad en su oferta agrícola. 

En este ciclo, Henry está solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar los insumos agrícolas para el mantenimiento de su café, y garantizar la nutrición que requieren sus plantaciones de café. Su meta, es tener una mejor cosecha este año, para tener mayores ingresos que le permitan dar a su familia mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Henry, aged 46, is a small coffee grower. He owns a farm with 3.52 hectares of coffee, on which he has been working for the past 10 years. In addition to growing coffee, he also grows grains, fruits, and bananas. With these crops, he has managed to keep his farm diversified in its agricultural offerings. 

This time, Henry is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy agricultural inputs for the maintenance of his coffee crops and to ensure that his coffee plantation obtains the nutrients it requires. 

His goal is to have a better harvest this year so that he can have a higher income. This will allow him to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for his coffee crops so that he can produce a better yield this cycle.

loans.name: Purificacion

texts.en:
Purificacion is 46 years old and married. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Purificacion runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like personal care products, canned goods, beverages, and other groceries.

Purificacion has been in this business for 20 years. 

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like personal care products, canned goods, beverages, and other groceries

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more rice bran stock to sell as  animal feed

loans.name: Dilshoda

texts.en:
Dilshoda is a cheerful woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in a family of farmers. She is living in a village with her family. She is single and does business at her young age. She, with her father, does business in agriculture. At the same time she does business and studies at college. Her major is as a programmer. 

Each year they plant potatoes, onions and wheat. 

She is planning to buy fertilizer and natural chemicals to process their land, and asks a loan from Kiva and IMON. 

She hopes to be supported and help her parents.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and natural chemicals to process their land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a photocopier, paper, pens, notebooks, and other products.

loans.name: Jose Balmore

texts.es: Jose de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo, el se dedica a la crianza de cerdos desde hace 4 años, comercializa los cerdos en los pueblos aledaños y con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas cerdos e insumos para alimentarlos y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose is 34 years old. He lives in his own house with his life partner and his son. He has earned a living raising pigs for the last 4 years. He sells the pigs in the surrounding towns, and with the sales he is able to cover some of the home expenses.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy more pigs, and supplies to feed them. In this way he can have greater financial earnings and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and supplies to feed them.

loans.name: Saralyn

texts.en:
Saralyn is a 40 years old, married, and has four children. Saralyn wants to earn a living with the help of her husband, as a fisherman, in providing for the needs of her family. 

She wants to have a better income, so she decided to borrowed a loan at GDMPC to purchase fertilizer for the banana farm to result in a good harvest and generate more income.

In the future, Saralyn wants to invest other businesses out from her business income.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer for the banana farm.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn works hard to support her family. She is married with one child and has a buy-and-sell dried fish business in the Philippines.

Analyn requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell.

She has been in this business for five years now, and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Jhon Alan

texts.es: JHON de 26 años de edad,  soltero y sin hijos, es un agradable estudiante de economía  que estudia mucho para alcanzar sus metas en la vida. JHON se solventa sus gastos con bastante esfuerzo, con mucha dedicación en sus  estudios está logrando un buen record de notas y así poder ser un buen economista.  Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de sus pensiones que necesita. JHON  se encuentra muy agradecido  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con muchos deseos de culminar sus metas propuestas agradece a Kiva y Edaprospo.
texts.en:
Jhon is 26 years old. He is single, and he does not have any children. He is a pleasant economics student who studies very much in order to accomplish his life goals. Jhon is able to cover his expenses with significant effort. With substantial dedication to his studies, he is earning good grades so that he can be a great economist. 

He is requesting a loan to cover the tuition that he needs to pay. John is very grateful for the support that he has been given. He has many wishes to complete his proposed goals, and he thanks Kiva and EDAPROSPO for this opportunity.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition.

loans.name: Iris Carolina

texts.es: Iris vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos,  ella se dedica a la ventas de productos lácteos desde hace 8 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de queso, crema, quesillo etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos
texts.en:
Iris lives in her own home with her life partner and their three children.

She has been making a living selling dairy products for the past eight years. She runs her business from her home. With what she makes from selling her products, she manages to cover some of her household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy cheese, cream, curd cheese, and the like so that she can have a better income.

loans.use: to buy cheese, cream, curd cheese, and the like.

loans.name: Ismael Ovidio

texts.es: Ismael de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos y además es albañil desde hace 20 años,  el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo el muro principal de su casa pero como no tiene suficiente capital para realizarlo por esa razón está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ladrillos, cemento, arena, entre otros materiales para que el su familia puedan vivir mas seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
Ismael, 33, lives in his own house with his family. He grows basic staples and has also worked in construction for 20 years. 

He wants to improve his home by building the main wall of his house, but as he doesn't have sufficient capital to do so, he is requesting a loan to purchase bricks, cement, sand and other materials, so that his family can live with more comfort and security.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, sand and other materials.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 41 years old and married with one child who is in school; she works very hard to provide for them.

Maria runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like sugar, salts, canned goods, beverages, personal care products and other groceries.

She has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Maria would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like sugar, salts, canned goods, beverages, personal care products and other groceries

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a poultry business in the Philippines.

Anita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her chickens.

She has been in this business for four years now, and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her chickens

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
Bella works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Bella requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Bella has been in this business for three years now, and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Cristita is 36 years old and has five children who are in school.

Cristita has a fruit vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fruits to sell in the market.

Cristita has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruits to sell in the market

loans.name: Chita

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Chita works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transportation business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. 

Chita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy spare parts, gasoline for her motorcycle and maintenance for her business.

Chita has been sustaining her business activities through her past one loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, gasoline for her motorcycle and maintenance for her business

loans.name: Jose Obdulio

texts.es: Don Jose de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles  desde hace 30 años cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarlos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abono, herbicidas, controles de plagas, etc. y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Don Jose is 57 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He has made a living cultivating corn and beans for 30 years, when his crop is ready the store in the barns that shows the photograph then markets them in the area where he resides. He is requesting a loan for the purchase of fertilizers, manure, herbicides, pest control, etc., and thus have a better economic income.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, manure, herbicides, and pest control, etc.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 55 years old and married with 14 children. With four children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Editha runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like home care products, eggs, cigarettes, and other groceries.

Editha has been in this business for 35 years now. 

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like home care products, eggs, cigarettes, and other groceries

loans.name: Dulce Flor

texts.en:
Dulce Flor is 41 years old and she is married and has two children who are still in school. Dulce Flor is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

Dulce Flor has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Emma is 35 years old and has three children who are in school.

Emma has a buy-and-sell fruits business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fruits to sell in her stall.

Emma has been in this business for six years. In the future, Emma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fruits to sell in her stall

loans.name: Glonelyn

texts.en:
Glonelyn is 34 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for them.

Glonelyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, etc.

She has been in this business for three years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, bread, etc

loans.name: Lusik

texts.en:
Lusik lives in Meghrashen village of Shirak region with her big and happy family. 

Her husband is migrant worker who left his country to search for a well paid job and sustain his family. Lusik is a mother of two sons; one of them is married and has a 2-year-old son. Lusik herself  is involved in agribusiness. She runs her own farm where she keeps livestock of cows, calves, sheep and hens. Lusik also cultivates wheat, barley and potatoes and as final produce, sells it in the local market.

She applied for this loan to ask lenders to support her farming business. She needs to purchase potato seeds and cover cultivation costs so the farm is developed and Lusik is able to earn income for her family. 

Because the region where Lusik's village is located is considered poor, and the unemployment rate there is very high, people face numerous difficulties in developing their businesses. Lusik's loan has been approved within the joint initiative between SEF and Kiva, which provides loans to the under-served population of the Shirak region to help them to access the market and earn a living.

loans.use: to pay for potato seeds and cover cultivation costs so the farm is developed and Lusik is able to earn income for her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start a new business, which is a stall for selling men's clothes.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.en:
Zulfiya is a generous woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1981. She is living in a rural area with her family. She is divorced and has three children. 

She has 10 years of experience doing business. She trades textiles and traditional textiles to making national clothes at the domestic market. Before, she did business with her mother-in-law, then after divorce she does business herself. 

She asked a loan from IMON and Kiva lenders to buy textiles and widen her assortment. She awaits Kiva lenders support.

loans.use: to buy textiles and widen her assortment

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 48 years old and married with five children.

She runs an agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Imelda is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Imelda has been in this business for five years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Ginnalyn

texts.en:
Ginnalyn is 37 years old and widowed with three children. With two children in school, Ginnalyn works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, beverages, and other groceries.

Ginnalyn has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, beverages, and other groceries.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Josephine works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending.  Josephine is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy additional fish net, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Josephine has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional fish net, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business

loans.name: Lady Love

texts.en:
Lady Love is a 24-year-old single woman with one child.

To earn a living, Lady Love runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, and bread. More generally, she would like to build and expand her business to secure a better future for her family.

loans.use: to expand and improve her business by purchasing more groceries (e.g., canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, and bread) to sell

loans.name: Yahya

texts.en:
Yahya (pictured) is a 21-year-old single man from Ramallah city. He lives with his family in a simple house.

Yahya wanted to improve himself and be independent so he decided to open his own business. To do so, Yahya is seeking a $1,000 loan from FATEN. The loan proceeds will help him start a new business: a store where he will sell men's clothes. He is confident that the loan will serve to improve his income and also his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to start a new business of selling men's clothes

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Lourdes works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from a general store.

Lourdes is seeking a loan in the amount of 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. She notes that she successfully repaid her previous loan and is now requesting another loan to further build her businesses. Lourdes has been sustaining her business activities through four prior loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to further expand her food production business by purchasing ingredients

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia works hard to support her family. Letecia is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Letecia requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like cloth, zippers, threads, yard and maintenance for her tailoring machine.

Letecia has been in this business for 3 years now.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like cloth, zippers, threads, yard and maintenance for her tailoring machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy another dairy cow

loans.name: Kanda

texts.en:
Kanda, 50, is a smallholder dairy farmer from the Kapsowar region of Kenya who is looking to venture into horticultural farming this year. The space available on his land can comfortably support both dairy and crop farming. However, Kanda's big challenge is lack of sufficient capital to kick-start crop farming. 
Kanda is seeking a KES 40,000 loan to pay for wages and farm inputs for his crop farming venture. Doing horticulture alongside dairy farming will do more than just boost Kanda's income: He will diversify his business' products and cut costs significantly by making better use of by-products. 
Your loan contribution towards this borrower will go a long way to uplift his family's livelihood.

loans.use: to grow crops

loans.name: Lorenie

texts.en:
Lorenie works hard to support her family. Lorenie is married with four children and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Lorenie requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Lorenie has been in this business for 13 years now, and also earns additional income from a general store.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Liberty

texts.en: Liberty is aged 50, married to a farmer, and they're blessed with two children. She owns and operates a retail store in their village for almost one year and earns a net income of PHP 400 daily. Her net income on this business was spent in their daily expenses. Due to insufficient capital of her business she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to purchase sugar, coffee, detergent soap, cooking oil, and beverages to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to become more productive and profitable.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, coffee, detergent soap, cooking oil, and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Zulayho

texts.en: Zulayho is a hardworking woman. She was born in southern part of Tajikistan in 1991. She is living in the district with her family. She is married and has three children. She does business in agriculture. She is planting agricultural products in her garden such as onion, tomato, wheat, cereals, etc. This season she is planning to fertilize and process her land and then to plant grains. She requests a loan from KIVA lenders to buy fertilizer and grain seeds to plant a new harvest. She hopes to be supported and has a good harvest to help her husband to feed their family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds to plant a new crop

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 60 years old, married and has two children. Lolita engaged in a vegetable garden for a living with the help of her husband as a farmer. She wants to earn a better income. That's why she borrowed a loan at GDMPC to purchase fertilizer for the garden and to be able to produce good harvest and generate more income.

For the future, Lolita wants to save money from her business' income.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer for the garden.

loans.name: Liezel

texts.en:
Liezel is 30 years old and married with three children.

Liezel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, eggs, biscuits, canned goods, etc.

Liezel has borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 4 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Liezel aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more to sell like noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, eggs, biscuits, canned goods, etc

loans.name: José Ovidio

texts.es:
Ovidio, de 39 años de edad, es agricultor y estudio hasta sexto grado, no siguió estudiando por que su padre falleció y tuvo que ayudarle a trabajar a su madre para poder ayudarle económicamente para los gastos de la casa, está acompañado y tiene 4 hijos de 11, 9, 7 y 2 años de edad, su esposa trabaja como costurera.

Ovidio, se dedica a la agricultura, a la ganadería y a la siembra de hortalizas desde hace 20 años, este trabajo lo aprecio de su mamá y de un tío, para llegar a su trabajo camina 2 kilómetros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m.

Ovidio, solicita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícola para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y 3,500 metros cuadrados de hortalizas, para lograr una mejor cosecha y con ello podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

Ovidio, sueña con trabajar mucho y ayudarles económicamente a sus hijos, para que puedan estudiar y obtener una profesión, para que en un futuro tengan mejores posibilidades de un buen trabajo y poder construir su vivienda de ladrillo, ya que en la que vive es de bahareque.
texts.en:
39-year-old Ovidio is a farmer and went to school until sixth grade. He didn't continue studying because his father died, and he had to help his mother work in order to contribute economically toward household expenses. He is in a relationship and has 4 children who are 11, 9, 7, and 2 years old. His wife works as a seamstress.

For 20 years, Ovidio has worked in farming and animal husbandry and has planted leafy vegetables. He learned this trade from his mom and an uncle. To get to work, he has to walk 2 kilometers, and his schedule is from 7am to 4pm.

Ovidio is requesting the loan to purchase farming supplies to grow 7,000 square meters of corn and 3,500 square meters of leafy vegetables. He hopes to obtain a better harvest, so that he can give his family a better quality of life.

Ovidio dreams of working hard and helping his children economically, so that they can study and become professionals who have better work opportunities. He also dreams of being able to build his home out of brick, as the one he currently lives in is made of mud walls.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies to grow 7,000 square meters of corn and 3,500 square meters of leafy vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials to change the potable water pipes that are in poor condition and obstruct the flow of important liquid.

loans.name: Teimuraz

texts.en: Teimuraz is 27 years old. He lives in Ozurgeti district with his parents, wife and two infant children. Teimuraz requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was rejected because of his low income and his family’s poor living conditions. Nowadays, the family has a small income, Teimuraz's salary is from working at a metal and plastic workshop. He wants to open his own workshop and increase his income. He has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages the provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions for rural poor people who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low incomes. With his loan, Teimuraz will open a plastic workshop. He will purchase equipment and raw materials and will get orders to make different kinds of plastic materials. This will increase the income of his family. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan, will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to open a plastic workshop for his start-up business.

loans.name: Marjona

texts.en:
Marjona is a hardworking woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1984. She is living in a small town with her family. She is married and has three children. She is a business woman. 

She does business at home sewing traditional women's dresses for Tajik women. She has many years of practice serving women and has permanent clients around. With the aim of enhancing her activity, she plans to buy a computerized sewing machine. She does business in order to help her husband feed their family. 

She requested a loan from Kiva lenders to buy a computerized sewing machine. She hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy a computerized sewing machine

loans.name: Maro1 Group

texts.en:
Farah is the featured borrower for Maro1 Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living at the same time.
Farah is a 21-year-old single lady who is studying nursing at the university. She is a very ambitious and talented lady. She started working in parallel as a nurse in a hospital to gain experience and to improve her living conditions. Farah loves this region. Today. she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her university tuition fees. Without this loan Farah will not be able to make her exams at the university. Farah is the first lady on the right of the photo.
With respect to the other group members, Ayat is a 29-year-old married mother of two children who wants to pay her son's surgery expenses, while Linda is a 35-year-old married mother of one child who wants to buy a refrigerator in order to keep food in a healthy condition. Ayat is the first lady on the left, while Linda is the lady standing in the middle.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition fees

loans.name: Karla Gissell

texts.es:
Karla es una mujer extrovertida, responsable y emprendedora, ella es propietaria de una comidería que se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos por la rentabilidad que ha desarrollado en los últimos 3 años. Ella es madre de dos niñas y junto a su esposo se esfuerzan por sacarlas adelante y ofrecerle  las mejores oportunidades de crecimiento. 

Por lo cual, solicita un crédito para comprar un exhibidor para buffet que le será de mucha ayuda porque podrá mostrar los platillos que prepara sin que estos se pongan fríos. Karla planea hacer más grande su local y ahorrar para comprar un vehículo.
texts.en:
Karla is an extroverted, responsible, and enterprising women. She is the owner of an eatery that has become her main source of income, due to how profitable it has become over the last 3 years. She is the mother of two girls, and along with her husband, she works to raise them well and give them the best opportunities to grow.

For these reasons, she is requesting a loan to purchase a buffet station. This will help her a lot because she will be able to display the dishes she makes without them becoming cold. Karla plans to expand her eatery and save up to buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy a buffet station

loans.name: Estanislao Antonio

texts.es:
Estanislao, de 43 años de edad, es albañil y su nivel de estudio fue hasta sexto grado, no continuo estudiando porque sus padres ya no pudieron seguir apoyandole economicamente; está casado y junto a su esposa tienen 7 hijos de 29, 22, 17, 13, 11, 9 y 4 años de edad, de los cuales uno está casado y trabaja para sus propios gastos, 2 estan trabajando para ayudarle economicamente en los gastos de la casa y los demás se encuentran estudiando; su esposa se dedica a atender un cafetin que esta ubicado en el centro educativo de su comunidad.

Estanislao, se dedica en el verano a la construccion y en el invierno a la siembra de granos básicos y de hortalizas, la siembra la ha realizado durante 27 años, este trabajo lo aprendio de su padre, quien siempre se dedico a este negocio, para llegar a su trabajo camina kilometros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. todos los dias.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar insumos agricolas como semilla y abono, con ello podra sembrar 21,000 metros cuadrados de maiz y 14,000 metros cudrados de hortalizas, para obtener mejores ingresos y poder darle a su familia una mejor alimentacion.

El sueño de Estanislao, es poder ahorrar mucho para poder ampliar su vivienda y ayudarle a sus hijos ara que estudien.
texts.en:
Estanislao, who is 43 years old, is a mason. He went to school through 6th grade. He didn't continue in school because his parents were not able to continue supporting him economically. He is married, and he and his wife have 7 children, ages 29, 22, 17, 13, 11, 9, and 4, of whom one is married and works for his own expenses, two are working to help him economically with the household expenses, and the others are in school. His wife works tending a snack bar that is located in the educational center of their community.

Estanislao works in construction in the summer, and in the winter he plants basic grains and vegetables. He has done the planting for 27 years. He learned this work from his father, who always worked in this business. To arrive at his work, he walks [several] kilometers, and his schedule is from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm every day.

The loan that he is applying for is to purchase agricultural supplies such as seeds and compost. With it, he will be able to plant 21,000 square meters of corn and 14,000 square meters of vegetables to obtain better income and be able to give his family a better diet.

Estanislao's dream is to be able to save a lot in order to be able to enlarge his house and help his children go to school.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seed and compost.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 52 years old and has three children. Gloria is married and has one child in school.

Gloria is in the agricultural business farming rice in the Philippines. Gloria requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Gloria has been in this business for 19 years now, and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Gloria would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Benedicto De Jesus

texts.es:
Benedicto, de 35 años de edad, es agricultor, está acompañado, tiene dos hijos que van a la escuela, debido a la pobreza en que vivió con sus padres, no tiene ningun grado academico y su pareja es ama de casa.

Benedicto, tiene 20 años de trabajar en la agricultura, este trabajo se lo enseñó su padre y sus hermanos mayores, su esposa es ahora quien le apoya con la agricultura, ambos se levantan muy temprano y se van para el campo a trabajar y regresan muy tarde.

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar insumos agricolas como abono, pesticidas, maiz, entre otros.

El sueño de Benedicto, es ayudar a sus hijos para que se preparen academicamente y tengan un trabajo digno y no tengan que sufrir tanto como lo ha hecho él, por no tener un nivel academico.
texts.en:
Benedicto is a 35 years old farmer. He is married and has two children who go to school. Due to poverty, he lived with his parents. He does not have any degree and his wife is a housewife.

Benedicto has 20 years of experience in agriculture. His father and his older brothers taught him the work. His wife helps with the farm. Both get up very early to go to the field and return very late.

The loan will be used to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer, pesticides, corn among others.

Benedicto's dream is to help his children to be prepared academically and to have a decent job. He does not want them to suffer as much as he for not having the school education.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer, pesticides, corn among others.

loans.name: Miguel Agustin

texts.es:
Miguel, de 63 años de edad, es agricultura, estudio hasta tercer grado, no continuo sus estudios porque tenían pocos recursos económicos y sus padres decidieron enseñarle a trabajar, para que pudiera ayudarles económicamente en los gastos de su casa.- Luego, decidió casarse y junto con su esposa tienen 11 hijos, de los cuales 2 se encuentran estudiando y 4 trabajan la agricultura; su esposa se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras como zanahorias, papas, güisquiles, chiles verdes, tomates, manzanas, uvas, naranjas, guineos etc.

Miguel, trabaja como empleado en una alcaldía, se desempeña en el área de mantenimiento; en la época de invierno se dedica a la agricultura, a la ganadería y a la siembra de hortalizas, trabajo que desempeña desde hace varios años y lo aprendió de sus padres, quienes siempre se han dedicado a este negocio.- Para trasladarse hacia su lugar de trabajo, camina 4 kilómetros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m. de lunes a viernes.

El crédito que está solicitando en la institución es para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono y semilla para cultivar 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz y ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, para lograr obtener más ingresos y poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de Miguel, es tener mejores ganancias, ahorrar mucho, mejorar su vivienda y ayudarles económicamente a sus hijos, para que puedan estudiar y ser profesionales para que logren tener mejores posibilidades de un buen trabajo.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 63 years old farmer. He studied until third grade but did not continue due to their limited financial resources. His parents decided to teach him to work so that he could help with the household expenses. Later, he married his wife and they have 11 children together. 2 of them are students and 4 of them work in the farm. His wife sells fruit and vegetables such as carrots, potatoes, chayotes, green peppers, tomatoes, apples, grapes, oranges, bananas etc.

Miguel works as a city hall maintenance worker. In winter, he has been working in agriculture, livestock and growing vegetables for several years. He learned this from his parents, who have always worked in agriculture. To get to his work, he walks 4 kilometers and his work hours are from 7:00 am to 3:00 pm Monday through Friday.

The loan is to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer and seed to grow 10,500 square meters of corns and to expand the sales of fruit and vegetables. This will increase revenue and give his family a better quality of life.

Miguel's dreams is to have better profit, save a lot, improve his home, and help his children financially so they can study and be professionals to achieve the best chance for a good job.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer and seed to grow 10,500 square meters of corns and to expand the sales of fruit and .

loans.name: Willy

texts.es:
Willy es un joven de 19 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera técnica de agroindustria.
Él es emprendedor, constante, activo, comprometido, responsable y muy buen estudiante. Sus estudios los realiza en la Unidad Académica Campesinas de ‘Batallas’ área caracterizada por su cercanía al lago sagrado Titicaca. Los pobladores del lugar se dedican a la agricultura, artesanía, pesca y ganadería. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre -2, 10 grados centígrados.
Willy es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultural general y por los estudios que realiza. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que se dedican a la agricultura, Viven en una casa propia construida de adobe con techo de calamina y piso de ladrillo, que cuenta con energía eléctrica, y agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba eléctrica no cuenta con alcantarillado. Él estudia la carrera técnica de agroindustria, se prepara para dar el valor agregado a las materias primas agropecuarias del lugar, “pienso diseñar e implementar nuevos productos agroalimentarios para nuestro ganado según las normas alimentarias…” comenta.  La ventaja de su actividad es que cuenta con los conocimientos y la agricultura del lugar para realizar las prácticas, la desventaja es la falta de recursos para la compra de los materiales de estudio. Su sueño es implementar un modelo de negocio para mejorar la agricultura del lugar, él desea realizar la compra de material de estudio, como; libros, cuadernos, lápices y pagar los gastos de transportes y otros gastos relacionados a sus estudios. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que estudia en la universidad.
Es por esos motivos que Willy solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de estudio para implementar un modelo de negocio para mejorar la agricultura de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Willy is a 19-year old young man. He is single, has no children and is studying toward a degree in Agro-Industry.

Willy is enterprising, tenacious, active, committed, responsible and a very good student. He attends the "Unidad Académica Campesinas de ‘Batallas’" in an area known for its proximity to the sacred lake, Titicaca. The inhabitants there make their livings in agriculture, handicrafts, fishing and raising livestock. The climate is cold and dry; the temperature during the day varies between -2 and 10 degrees centigrade.

Willy has a dark complexion, brown eyes and short black hair. He is short and thin. His native tongue is Aymará, which he speaks at home. When out and about and at school, he speaks Spanish. Willy lives with his parents, who make their living in agriculture. They live in their own home, which is made of adobe and has a corrugated iron roof and brick floors. They have electricity and a well that has an electric pump. They do not have a sewage system.

Willy is studying toward a degree in Agro-Industry. He is preparing himself to add to the value of the agriculture and livestock raw materials in the area. “I plan to design and implement new food and agriculture products for our livestock, according to food standards," he says. The advantage of his business plan is that he has a lot of knowledge about local agriculture to help him carry out his practices. The disadvantage is his lack of resources to purchase study materials.

Willy's dream is to implement a business model to improve agriculture in the area. He wants to be able to purchase school supplies, such as books, notebooks and pencils and to pay for his transportation and school-related costs.

This is Willy's first lending cycle with the institution in the year he has been attending the university.

This is why Willy is requesting a loan: to purchase school supplies so he can implement a business model to improve agriculture in his community.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies so he can implement a business model that would improve agriculture in his community.

loans.name: Enriquita

texts.en:
Enrequita is a woman with six children. Enrequita is 53 years old and one of her children is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Enrequita has a candy-making business in the Philippines. Enrequita requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Enrequita has been in this business for 16 years. In the future, Enrequita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, cooking oil, and peanuts.

loans.name: Leones

texts.en:
Leones is 42 years old and married with three children, who are all attend in school. Leones works very hard to provide for them.

Leones runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Leones has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Leones would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 30 years old and has three children. She is married and two of her children are in school.

Teresita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Teresita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed, medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Teresita has been raising pigs for two years now and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicines and vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Lorie

texts.en:
Lorie works hard to support her family. She is married and has a ice cream making business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 20 years now.

Lorie has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food production business.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 8 years now.

Elisa has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food production business.

In the future, Elisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Jose Guadalupe

texts.es:
José, de 43 años de edad, es agricultor, no estudio debido a que sus padres solo alcanzaban para la alimentacion diaria, dejo de estudiar y decidio aprender a trabajar para ayudarle a sus padres en los gastos de la casa; está acompañado y tiene 4 hijos de 16, 14, 11 y 6 años de edad, de los cuales 2 ayudan a trabajar y 2 estan estudiando, mientras su esposa se dedica a la venta de ropa y golosinas.

José, se dedica a la ganaderia y a la agricultura desde hace 20 años, pero tambien trabaja de vigilante en un ingenio, la agricultura la aprendio de sus padres, quienes siempre se han dedicado a este negocio, para llegar a su trabajo camina 2 kilometros y su horario de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar 2 teneritas y tambien para comprar insumos agricolas para cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maiz, en donde espera obtener una buena cosecha y de esa manera darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

El sueño de José, es ahorrar mucho para tener un negocio y asi poder ayudarle a sus hijos economicamente para que puedan estudiar una carrera universitaria y puedan tener mejores posibilidades de un trabajo mejor.
texts.en:
Jose, 43, is a farmer.  He did not get an education, because his parents had only enough money to feed him.  He left school and decided to learn to work in order to help his parents with the household expenses.  He is married, and has 4 children aged 16, 14, 11, and 6.  Two of his children help him with his work, and 2 attend school. His wife has a business selling clothing and snacks.

Jose has been farming and raising livestock for 20 years, but he also works as a security guard at a factory.  He learned to farm from his parents, who had always worked as farmers.  To get to his fields he walks 2 kilometers,and his daily work schedule is 7am to 4pm.

Jose is requesting a loan to buy 2 calves, and also to buy agricultural supplies for his 14,000 square meters of corn in the hopes of getting a good harvest. This way, he can provide his family with a better quality of life.

Jose's dream is to save a lot to buy a business so that he could help his children financially.  This way, they could study for a university degree and have the best possible work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy 2 calves and agricultural supplies

loans.name: El Pozo Group

texts.es:
“El Pozo”, es un grupo consolidado, responsable, y muy laborioso, conformado por 3 mujeres emprendedoras. Están con ADIM, por decimocuarta vez, solicitando crédito para engrandecer sus negocios. 
Su coordinadora es Yajaira, de 36 años, casada y madre de 2 hijos, de 13 y 3 años edad. Tiene su negocio de ventas de cerámicas en su domicilio, y con la ayuda de su esposo han mantenido el negocio por 10 años. Expresa que con el crédito anterior las ganancias mejoraron y compro una refrigeradora para su hogar. Con el crédito actual invertirá en la compra de diversos productos cerámicos con diseños de mariquitas, jarrones de piso, loros, lunas, soles y guardabarrancos. Y con las ganancias desea seguir mejorando su negocio. 
Las demás integrantes son María Epifanía, de 55 años, dedicada también a la venta de cerámica;  y Cruz de 63 años quien se dedica a la venta de hojas chagüite, con el crédito desea comprar 15 parcelas de hoja. Logrando así aumentar las ganancias y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
“El Pozo” [The Well] is a responsible, hard-working group in solidarity with one another. It is made up of 3 enterprising women. They are requesting a loan with ADIM for the 14th time, in order to enlarge their businesses.

Their coordinator is 36-year-old Yajaira, who is married and the mother of two children, who are 13 and 3 years old. She runs her pottery sales business out of her home, and with the help of her husband, she has maintained the business for 10 years. She says that with the previous loan, her earnings increased and she bought a refrigerator for her home. She will invest the current loan in the purchase of various ceramic products with butterfly, parrot, moon, sun, and guardabarranco [a type of bird] designs, and flower urns.

The other members are 55-year-old María Epifanía, who also works selling pottery, and 63-year-old Cruz, who works selling banana leaves. Cruz wants to use her portion of the loan to buy 15 parcels of leaves, so she can increase her earnings and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy various ceramic products, such as ladybugs, urns, parrots, moons, suns, and guardabarrancos

loans.name: Walter Antonio

texts.es:
Walter, de 35 años de edad, es pescador, estudio hasta primer grado, no continuo sus estudios porque sus padres no pudieron seguir ayudandole, está casado y tiene 3 hijos de 15, 10 y 6 años de edad, de los cuales 2 están esudiando y le ayudan a su madre a cuidar los animales; su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, al cuido de el ganado y a la crianza de cerdos.

Walter, trabaja en una lancha en la pezca artesanal, trabaja de esa manera desde hace varios años, este trabajo lo aprendio por la misma necesidad que tenia, para darle a sus hijos todo lo necesario; para llegar a su trabajo viaja en motocicleta varios kilometros y su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. todos los dias y en sus tiempos libres ayuda a cuidar sus animales.

Walter, está solicitando un crédito para comprar ganado de repasto, pues se acerca el invierno y es ahi donde aprovecha para engordarlos y venderlos dentro de un tiempo, para poder obtener ganancias.

El sueño de Walter, es construir un corral con mucho ganado y ampliar el negocio de la crianza de cerdos.
texts.en:
Walter, 35, is a fisherman who has a first grade education. He did not continue in school because his parents were not able to continue to help him.  He is married and has 3 children aged 15, 10 and 6 years.  Two of his children are in school, and they help their mother care for the animals.  His wife is devoted to the household chores, the care of cattle, and the raising of pigs.

Walter works from a boat and fishes using traditional methods.  He's been doing this work for a number of years.  He learned this trade so that he could give his children everything they need. To get to work, Walter travels on a motorcycle several kilometers.  He works from 6am until 6pm every day, and in his free time he helps to care for his animals.

Walter is requesting a loan to buy pasture cattle, as winter is approaching, and that is the time to fatten them.  He will sell them after a time in order to obtain income.

Walter's dream is to build a corral that has a lot of cattle and expand his business raising pigs.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 43 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Lucy runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell such as biscuits, bread, noodles, milk, coffee, eggs, drinks, sugar, etc.

Lucy has been in this business for 2 years.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell at her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy scrap material in bulk for reselling to the recycling factories by her husband.

loans.name: Maritza Esmeralda

texts.es: Maritza tiene 40 años de edad y vive junto a su esposo y sus tres hijas de 20, 10 y 8 años de edad a los que apoyan para que estudien, ya que desean que ellos tengan un futuro mejor. Maritza es una mujer emprendedora que buscando la manera de apoyar con los gastos de su hogar decidió dedicarse a la elaboración de sellos profesionales, actividad que realiza desde hace 4 años, por lo que gracias a su experiencia y responsabilidad cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en una máquina para elaborar sellos y de esta manera mejorar su servicio, para poder continuar apoyando a sus hijos con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Maritza is 40 years old and lives with her husband and their three children aged 20, 10, and 8. They support them in their schooling because they want them to have a better future.

Maritza is an enterprising woman who, looking for a way to assist with household expenses, decided to work making professional stamps. She has been doing this for four years now, and thanks to her experience and responsibility, she has a large number of customers.

She is requesting a loan through FUSAI to invest in a stamp-making machine. This will improve her service, allowing her to continue helping her children with their studies.

loans.use: to invest in a stamp-making machine, so she can improve her service

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José, de 64 años de edad, es jornalero, no estudio debido a la falta de recursos económicos en que vivían, está casado y junto con su esposa tienen 4 hijos de 30, 28, 26 y 24 años de edad, los cuales ya están casados y trabajan para sus propios hogares.

José, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería desde hace 38 años, este trabajado lo aprendió de sus padres, quienes siempre se han dedicado a este negocio, también se dedica a cortar caña en el verano; para llegar a su trabajo camina 3 kilómetros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 11:00 a.m. todos los días.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, pesticidas y fertilizantes, para sembrar 28,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, 7,000 metros cuadrados de frijol y 21,000 metros cuadrados de maicillo, de esa manera lograra una mejor cosecha y obtendrá mejores ingresos, para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de José, es ampliar su negocio para tener mayores ingresos y ahorrar mucho para poder construir su vivienda de ladrillo, ya que en la que está viviendo es de adobe y esta deteriorada.
texts.en:
José is a 64 years old laborer. He did not study due to lack of financial resources. He is married and have 4 children aged 30, 28, 26 and 24. They are married and are working for their own households.

José has worked in agriculture and livestock for 38 years. He learned this work from his parents who have always worked in this business. He also cuts cane in the summer. He walks 3 kilometers to get to work and his work hours are from 7am to 11am every day.

The loan is to buy agricultural inputs such as compost, pesticides and fertilizers to plant 28,000 square meters of corn, 7,000 square meters of beans and 21,000 square meters of sorghum. This will yield better harvest and higher income in order to give his family a better quality of life.

José’s dream is to expand his business to obtain more income and save a lot to build his brick house. His current adobe house is deteriorated.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as compost, pesticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en:
Herminia is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Herminia is 43 years old and two of her children are currently in school.

Herminia has a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 11 years. Herminia requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

In the future, Herminia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es:
Samuel es un joven hombre de 19 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y su negocio es la producción y venta de queso artesanal.
Él es emprendedor, Inteligente, paciente, constante, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad ‘Calasaya’; comunidad indígena que en sus orígenes fue una hacienda, situada al sur del lago sagrado Titicaca  a 3985 metros sobre el nivel del mar. 
Samuel es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus padres que son mayores de edad y no trabajan, viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construida de adobe con techo de calamina y piso de ladrillo que cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo extraída mediante una bomba eléctrica. Su negocio es la producción y venta de queso artesanal; elaborado con leche cruda de su propio establo, el cual lo moldea a mano, acomodando la cuajada en un retazo de algodón, que se suspende por los cuatro vértices, se va eliminando el suero y atándolo, Una vez atado Se introduce en salmuera y se deja oreando en las cavas, para que comience a desarrollar la flora de la superficie, “El queso que producimos es artesanal y también estamos iniciando la producción de quesos pasteurizados…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con la experiencia familiar la desventaja es la falta de leche para la producción. Su sueño es ampliar su establo y su producción quesera, él desea realizar la compra de ganado lechero para aumentar su producción lechera y pasteurizar su nueva producción. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que desarrolla esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Samuel solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado lechero para la pasteurización de su nueva producción de quesos artesanales.
texts.en:
Samuel is a 19 year-old man. He is a single man with no children, whose business is the production of artisanal cheeses. He is enterprising, intelligent, patient, persistent, responsible, and very hard working.

He operates his business in the community of Calasaya. This is an indigenous community that originated on a ranch on the south side of the sacred lake Titicaca, at 3985 meters over sea level.

Samuel is brown-skinned, with hazel eyes, and short black hair. He is of short stature and has a slim build. His native tongue is Aymara, which is spoken in the region, and he speaks Spanish in the general culture and in his business interactions. He lives with his older parents, who do not work. They share a home that they own, built of adobe, with a tin roof and a brick floor. It has electricity and well water, which is obtained by an electric pump. 

He is in the business of producing and selling artisanal cheese, which he makes from raw milk produced in his own barn. He forms it by hand, wrapping the curd in cotton and hanging it by four corners. As the whey comes out, he ties it and puts it in brine and then lets it age in cellars so that the surface flora emerge.  “We produce artisanal cheese and we’re also beginning to produce pasteurized cheeses,” he says. His business benefits from family experience but has the disadvantage of not having enough milk for production.

His dream is to expand his barn and increase his cheese production. He hopes to buy dairy cattle to increase his milk production and pasteurize his latest product.  This is the first loan cycle with the institution in the two years that he has been doing this on his own. 

For these reasons Samuel is seeking this loan to buy dairy cattle for pasteurization of his new line of artisanal cheeses.

loans.use: to buy dairy cattle for pasteurization of his new line of artisinal cheeses.

loans.name: Pascuala Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Pascuala, de 64 años, es una mujer trabajadora y entregada a su trabajo. Proveniente de la comarca rural, Pacayita de Masaya. Solicita a ADIM su vigésimo cuarto préstamo, para invertirlo en su negocio de venta de productos derivados del Maíz, negocio que lo empezó con el préstamo que su mamá le proporciono. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cacao, maíz y leña. Con las ganancias que obtendrá está segura seguir cumpliendo con los pagos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
64-year-old Pascuala is a hard-working woman who is invested in her work. She comes from the rural region of Pacayita in Masaya.

She is requesting her 24th loan from ADIM, to invest in her business of selling corn-derived products, which she started with a loan from her mom. With the income she will earn, she will be sure to continue paying the loan installments and will improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cocoa, corn, and firewood

loans.name: Nelie

texts.en:
Aged 60, Nelie is a mother of two children. In order to earn a living, she has a flower garden. She has been in this business for two years and it was a profitable business for the family. Nelie wants to earn a better income for the family so she decided to borrow in order to purchase additional seeds and fertilizer to expand her garden, make her flowers beautiful and create more sales to result in more income.

Nelie wants for the future to invest in other businesses out of her business income.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds and fertilizer to expand her garden.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 47 years old and one of her children is in school.

Yolanda has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for ten years. She requested a PHP 45,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

In the future, Yolanda would like to save enough money to expand her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Luvismenda

texts.en:
Luvismenda is 64-years-old and married with five children. Luvismenda works very hard to provide for them.

Luvismenda runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, milk, coffee, spices, noodles, drinks, bread, cooking oil and etc.

Luvismenda has been in this business for 15 years.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, milk, coffee, spices, noodles, drinks, bread, cooking oil and etc.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is a woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Mary Jane is 36-years-old and her four children are in school.

Mary Jane has a buy and sell dried fish business in the Philippines. Mary Jane has requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy more fish to dry and sell.

Mary Jane has been in this business for six years. In the future, Mary Jane would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to dry and sell.

loans.name: Mabel

texts.en:
Mabel is 32 years old, and married with three children.

Mabel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries like milk, coffee, canned goods, sugar, spices, shampoo, drinks, breads and etc. to sell.

Mabel has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Mabel aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like milk, coffee, canned goods, sugar, spices, shampoo, drinks, breads and etc. to sell.

loans.name: Mirian Noemi

texts.es:
Mirian, vende cosméticos y lociones por encargo en catálogos, es madre soltera, vive con sus padres y su hija de 7 años de edad, su negocio nace por la necesidad de tener  ingresos con los que puede cubrir las necesidades de su familia, tiene un horario de trabajo de ocho de la mañana a cinco de la tarde.
Utilizará el préstamo para comprar lociones, labiales, mascarillas, cremas corporales, entre otros productos de belleza y de uso personal, podrá tener su pedido a tiempo para distribuir los productos a sus clientes, de esta manera tendrá mejores ventas y contara con nuevos ingresos.
Sus aspiraciones son crecer con su negocio y salir adelante con su hijo.
texts.en:
Mirian sells cosmetics and lotions for custom catalogs. She is a single mother and lives with her parents and her 7 year old daughter. Her business arose from the financial need for the family. Her work hours are 8am to 5pm.

She will use the loan to buy lotions, lipsticks, face masks, body creams, among other beauty products and for personal use. She will be able to have the order on hand for timely distribution to the customers so that she will have better sales and income.

Her aspirations are to grow with her business and to get ahead with her child.

loans.use: to buy lotions, lipsticks, face masks, body creams, among other beauty products and for personal use.

loans.name: Ricardo Abrahan

texts.es:
Ricardo, tiene una familia integrada por su esposa y un hijo, él es el responsable de darles alimento, vestuario y cubrir otras necesidades básicas de su hogar. Su negocio se trata de brindar el servicio de peluquería, lo hace de siete de la mañana a cinco de la tarde, tiene su negocio hace 6 años, aprendió el oficio mediante cursos.
Está necesitando de un crédito, el cual  básicamente lo invertirá en la compra de una máquina para cortar pelo, peines, gel para el cabello y otros materiales necesarios para desarrollar sus actividades, mejorarán la atención a sus clientes y espera mantener la continuidad de su negocio.
Sus sueños son tener un negocio mucho más grande, tener nuevos clientes y pagar su deuda.
texts.en:
Ricardo’s family is made up of his wife and a son. He is responsible for providing food, cloth and other basic household needs. He works in hair salon. His work hours are 7am to 5pm. He has had the salon for 6 years. He learned the trade through courses.

Ricardo is in need of a loan to buy a clipper, combs, hair gel and other materials necessary for the work. This will improve service to his customers. He hopes to maintain the business continuity .

His dreams are to have a much larger business, have new customers, and pay his debt.

loans.use: to buy a clipper, combs, hair gel and other materials necessary for the work.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: La vivienda en la que vive María es muy humilde, ya que esta construida con láminas viejas y el piso es de tierra, pero en ella vive junto a su hijo de 30 años de edad que es su soporte, ya que gracias a la buena educación que ella le dio el siempre busca la manera de apoyarla. María es una mujer emprendedora que siempre ha salido adelante a base de mucho esfuerzo, actualmente se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos, actividad que le permite obtener excelentes ingresos económicos. María desea invertir en su negocio, ya que sabe que entre más productos tenga mejores serán sus ventas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en cerdos para su venta, lo cual le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
The house in which Maria lives is very modest, with dirt floors and constructed of old sheets of metal. She lives there with her 30 year old son who supports her, but thanks to the good education she gave him always finds a way to assist her. Maria is a quick-learning woman who has always gotten out ahead due to great effort. 

She currently makes a living through buying and selling pigs, work that yields excellent economic income. Maria desires to invest in her business as she knows that the more products she has the better sales will be. This is why she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to invest in pigs to sell, which will allow her to improve her income.

loans.use: To invest in pigs to sell, which will allow her to improve her income.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy crops for avocado, papaya and mango.

loans.name: Upel

texts.ru: Упель, 55 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей, муж активно помогает по хозяйству. У Упель средне-специальное образование, сельским хозяйством занимается с 2010 года. На сегодня в хозяйстве есть корова, на ежедневной основе продает молоко, домашнее, экологически чистое и очень вкусное оно пользуется большим спросом, принося ежемесячный доход  в среднем 12,000 сом (KGS). Упель обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Упель планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и хочет накопить средства на помощь в постройке дома для ее сына.
texts.en: Upel is 55 years old, married, a mother of two children, and her husband actively helps her with the business. Upel has a specialized secondary education and has been involved in agriculture since 2010. She currently has a cow and sells farm-fresh, organic, very delicious and highly demanded milk on a daily basis, and earns an average monthly income of 12,000 som (KGS). Upel requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy 2 cows in order to increase her livestock headcount. Upel plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further developing her business and wants to save money to help build a house for her son.

loans.use: to buy 2 cows in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Nurzhamal

texts.ru: Нуржамал, 46 лет, вдова, мать 3 сыновей. Образование у Нуржамал среднее, она 12 лет занимается торговлей продуктами питания. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 35,000 (KGS) в месяц. Нуржамал решила развить свою деятельность, для этого она обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку продуктов питания для расширения ассортимента. На прибыль от кредита планирует и  дальше развивать ее дело.
texts.en: Nurzhamal is 46 years old, a widow and a mother of 3 sons. Nurzhamal has a secondary education and has been involved in selling food products for 12 years. Her monthly profit amounts to about 35,000 som (KGS) per month. Nurzhamal decided to develop her business and requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to buy food products in order to expand her selection. She plans to use the profit from the business to continue developing her business.

loans.use: to buy food products in order to expand her selection

loans.name: Yuldosh

texts.ru:
Это серьезный человек Юлдош. Он занимается сварщиком. Его работа связана  металлам. Стать сварщиком нелегко, но у Юлдош есть большое ремесло, поэтому он умеет заниматься этой работе.  Он любить заниматься металлическим вещам, по этой причине он взял эту профессию. 
Юлдош женат и имеет 5 детей. Жена домохозяйка. Старший сын бизнесмен. Он занимается торговлей. Младший сын мастер по ремонту домов. Дочки тоже домохозяйка, они помогает маме на домашнее работе. У старшей дочери Юлдош скора свадьба. Они готовятся к свадьбе. Юлдошу не хватает денежных средств для купли свадебные принадлежности, и решил обратиться к Вам за кредитом. Юлдош надеется на Вашу поддержку.  Не откажите ему на помощь, поддержите его. Он будет очень благодарен на Вашу помощь.
texts.en:
This serious person is Yuldosh. He is a welder and works with metals. It was difficult to become a welder, but Yuldosh has a lot of skills and this is why he can do this work. He loves to work with metals, and this is why he chose this profession.

Yuldosh is married and has 5 children. His wife is a homemaker. His oldest son is a businessman. He is involved in sales. The youngest son is house repairman. The daughters are also homemakers and help their mother with household work. Yuldosh's oldest daughter is getting married soon, and they are preparing for the wedding. Yuldosh does not have enough money to buy everything for the wedding and decided to request a loan from You. Yuldosh hopes for Your support. Please do not refuse his request and support him. He will be very grateful for Your help.

loans.use: to buy necessities to hold his daughter's wedding

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph, 45, is a smallholder mixed-farmer from Thangatha village which is found in the central province of Kenya. Joseph is married and blessed with 7 children aged between 12 and 27. 

Joseph has been earning a decent living for his family as a farmer for the last 28 years, and he still has plans to get bigger. He is seeking a loan to expand his banana farm. He will use the money to pay for wages and farm inputs such as fertilizer. 

The banana business is a profitable business, yet hard for smallholder farmers to enter due to prohibitive capital costs. However, your loan will make it possible for Joseph to invest in more banana trees and double the quantity of bananas that he supplies.
 
Additional income from the investment will be ploughed back into the business to improve his family's livelihood in the long run.

loans.use: to grow more bananas on his farm

loans.name: Maria Ruby

texts.en:
Maria Ruby is 39 years old and single.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more grocery items to sell like noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, eggs, biscuits, canned goods, spices, etc.

Maria Ruby has borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 7 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

She works hard to provide for her family, and she aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell like noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, eggs, biscuits, canned goods, spices, etc.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia is 54 years old and married with seven children. With one child in school, Olivia works very hard to provide for them.

Olivia runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, homecare products and other groceries. She has been in this business for 15 years. 

In the future, Olivia would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, homecare products and other groceries

loans.name: Luís Alexander

texts.es:
Luis, de 45 años de edad, es jornalero, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casado y tiene 3 hijos de 19, 16 y 5 años de edad, los cuales están estudiando, mientras su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y tambien al cuido de los animales.

Luis, se dedica a la agricultura y al cuido de ganado desde hace varios años, este trabajo lo aprendio porque sus padres le enseñaron, ya que ellos siempre se han dedicado a este negocio; para trasladarse hacia el trabajo camina 3 kilometros y su horario de 6:00 a.m. a 11:00 a.m. todos los dias.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar ganado de repasto, pues se acerca el invierno y tiene que aprovechar para engordarlos para luego venderlos dentro de un tiempo.

El sueño de Luis, es construir un corral con mucho ganado.
texts.en:
Luis, 45 years old, is a day laborer, studied up to the sixth grade. He is married and has 3 children  who are 19, 16 and 5 years old and are studying. His wife is in charge of the housework and also to the care of the animals.

Luis has worked in agriculture and the care of cattle for several years. He has learned this work because his parents taught him, as they have always worked in this business. To get to work, he walks three kilometers and his hours are from 6:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. every day.

The loan he is requesting is to buy grazing cattle, as winter is approaching and he must use this time to fatten and then sell them within a period of time.

Luis' dream is to build a corral with many cattle.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 56 years old and married with seven children, three who are still in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Marlyn runs a general store in the Philippines and has been in this business for 6 years. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to buy more groceries to sell, such as milk, coffee, drinks, canned goods, noodles, bread, spices and other personal items.

Marlyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell, such as milk, coffee, drinks, canned goods, noodles, bread, spices and other personal items.

loans.name: Jimena

texts.es:
Jimena es una mujer de 33 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo varón de 2 años, y su negocio es la venta de ropa de cholita.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, constante, paciente, organizada, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘Luis pampa’ situada al sur de la ciudad, caracterizada por estar rodeada de casa de adobe con piso de tierra. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre -2 y 10 grados centígrados.
Jimena es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja  estatura, complexión física delgada, su forma de vestir es tradicional (pollera, manta y sombrero), su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica a la confección y con su hijo que aún no se encuentra en edad escolar, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de ropa de cholita. La chola es la mujer de vestir tradicional, su ropa consta de; sombrero, manta, pollera, enaguas, zapatos y accesorios, “inicié mi negocio con la ayuda de mi mamá para luego independizarme…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que lo realiza en su domicilio y no paga alquileres extras, la desventaja es que no cuenta con una cartera de clientes amplia. Su sueño es establecer su tienda de ropa, ella desea realizar la compra de tela para la confección de ropa de cholita por mayor.
