Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que desarrolla esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Jimena solicita un préstamo para la compra de cortes de tela para la confección de ropa de cholita para establecer su tienda de ropa.
texts.en:
Jimena is 33 years old and lives with her partner. She has a 2-year old son and earns her living running a traditional clothing business.

Jimena is a good mother, enterprising, determined, patient, organized, responsible, and very hardworking. Her business is located in the Luis Pampa area, south of the town. The local houses are typical of the area, made of adobe with earth floors. The climate is cold and dry with a temperature which varies from -2 to 10C.

Jimena is dark-skinned with brown eyes and long black hair worn in a braid. She is small in size and slim. She dresses in traditional clothing (skirt, shawl and hat), and her native language is Aymará which she speaks with her family. She also speaks Spanish for cultural and business reasons. 

Her partner earns his living making clothing. Their son doesn't yet go to school. They live in their own house made of bricks and cement with a corrugated metal roof and a wooden floor. They have water, electricity, gas and a sewer system.

Jimena sells women's traditional clothing which consists of a hat, shawl, skirt, underskirt, shoes, and accessories. She explains that she started her business with help from her mother and then became independent. She has the advantage of being able to run her business from her home so doesn't have to pay rent. A disadvantage is that she doesn't have regular customers.

Jimena's dream is to open a store selling clothing. She now wishes to buy fabric wholesale for making traditional clothing. This is her first loan with this institution in the six years she's been running her business.

Jimena is seeking a loan to buy lengths of fabric to make traditional clothing and open a clothing store.

loans.use: buy lengths of fabric to make traditional clothing and open a clothing store

loans.name: Jovie

texts.en:
Jovie is 33 years old and married with five children, three of whom are currently in school.

Jovie is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock. She has been raising livestock for 5 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Jovie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Amos

texts.en:
Most people in the world dream of getting well-paying jobs. Amos, from the Kitale area of Kenya, has never secured one and has opted to be a smallholder farmer. He decided that he will be independent and contribute to his community by practicing mixed farming. His primary sources of income are dairy and poultry farming, as well as some personal business that he does to supplement his meagre income. Deciding to practice poultry farming for Amos was not difficult. He learned the practice from his parents. For the past three years, Amos has been earning a decent income from poultry farming. However, the demand is overwhelming and he wants to increase his poultry, but the biggest challenge is lack of funds. 

He is seeking a loan to purchase additional poultry. Poultry farming has become one of the most important aspects of agriculture in Kenya because it creates business opportunities for entrepreneurs and it’s a kind of business that seems unlikely to ever dry up. Poultry farming is a less strenuous activity that is profitable. Many poultry farmers find a sense of fulfillment having hens all over their homestead. The hens lay eggs that can be consumed or sold. If taken seriously, poultry farming has the potential of being a big business because the demand for poultry products is always high. 

Amos is blessed with two beautiful children whom he refers to as his "heartbeat.” With your loan, Amos is going to make more income, which will enable him to take care of his family's expenses. As times keep getting harder, Amos is doing all he can do to ensure that his family's basic needs are met.

loans.use: to buy poultry for his small farm.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Mary Grace works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from raising pigs.  Mary Grace is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, spices, cooking oil, flour and other materials for her food production business.

Mary Grace has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, spices, cooking oil, flour and other materials for her food production business

loans.name: Yegli Susana

texts.es:
Yegli, de 28 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañada y tiene 2 hijos, su pareja trabaja de vigilante en un ingenio.

Yegli, tiene una tienda en su casa desde hace 4 años, aprendio a administrarla gracias a su madre, con las gancias de la tienda le ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.

Yegli, está solicitando el crédito para comprar productos de la canasta básica para surtir su tienda y asi mejorar sus ingresos. 

Yegli, sueña con comprar una vivienda digna para su familia.
texts.en:
Yegli, 28 years old, is a housewife, studied through the sixth grade.  She lives in common law and has 2 children. Her partner works in a sugar mill as a watchman.

Yegli, has had a shop at home for 4 years. She learned to manage it thanks to her mother.  With the store earnings, she helps her husband with household expenses.

Yegli, requests a loan to buy staple goods to stock her store and thus increase their income.

Yegli, dreams of buying a decent house for her family.

loans.use: to buy staple goods to stock her store.

loans.name: Wilfred

texts.en:
Wilfred, 27 years old, is married to Nancy and supports four family members. 

He has been practicing small-scale farming for the last 10 years, earning an income of KES 15,000 per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate his children. 

His hope is to lead a financially stable life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Junefe

texts.en:
Junefe is 39 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Junefe runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, fabric conditioners, cereals, milk, coffee, etc. to sell.

Junefe has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, fabric conditioners, cereals, milk, coffee, etc. 

Junefe would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, fabric conditioners, cereals, milk, and coffee to sell

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is 38 years old and married with two children.

She runs an agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Michelle is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Michelle has been in this business for seven years and earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Virginia

Virginia requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

Virginia has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Virginia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

Rebecca runs a general store  in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal product cae and other groceries.

Rebecca has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items. 

In the future, Rebecca would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.name: Marife

texts.en:
Marife is 43 years old and has three children. Marife is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Marife is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Marife requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Marife has been farming vegetables for 4 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Marife would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is married with three children ages twenty eight, twenty five and sixteen years.  Mary sells sachet water and has been doing this business for eight years now with seven employees who sell in markets, schools and bus terminals for wages.Mary was operating the sachet water business with three girls but they are now seven, which indicates that the demand for her water has increased.

She will use this loan to purchase more sachet water and sell to her neighbours. This is the first time she is accessing this facility.

loans.use: To buy more bags of sachet water in order to expand her business

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn, is aged 53, married to a construction worker and they're blessed with seven children. She has owned and operates a retail store in their village for almost two years and earns a net income of PHP 900 daily. Due to insufficient capital in her business, she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to purchase beverages, frozen foods, rice grains, canned goods, coffee, and sugar to sell. She's hoping that her store will continue to improve and become more productive.

loans.use: To purchase beverages, frozen foods, rice grains, canned goods, coffee, and sugar to sell.

loans.name: El Rabih Aytat Group

texts.en:
Awatef is the featured borrower for El Rabih Aytat Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and life at the same time.

Awatef is a 52-year-old married mother of four children. Her husband traveled outside Lebanon seeking a better income, while she is selling Tupperware to help him in covering the needs and expenses of their children. Awatef is an ambitious lady and hard worker who is trying hard to develop her business. Thus, today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her merchandise with a new collection of Tupperware. 

Awatef is the first lady on the left in the photo. With respect to the other group members, Ekmal is the lady sitting in the middle, while Hanan is the first lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of Tupperware

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en: Hellen is 42 years old, married and blessed with 7 children.She is a dairy farmer and has been supplying milk to her customers for 8 years now. She will be using the loan to buy dairy feeds,nappier grass and hay for her dairy cows and hopes this will enable her to get more milk for sell. She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. Her future hopes are to improve her dairy farming, make more income and support her family.

loans.use: To buy dairy feeds,nappier grass and hay for her dairy cows and hopes this will enable her to get more milk for sell and get more income to support her family.

She has a food processing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from vegetable vending. Rowena is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business for her food processing business.

Rowena has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia is 58 years old and married with three children. Nelia works very hard to provide for them.

Nelia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell like milk, coffee, canned goods, noodles, spices, drinks, juice, bread, etc.

Nelia has been in this business for five years.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

Raiza aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.name: Yolanda

Yolanda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care product, and other groceries.

Yolanda has been in this business for 3 years now. 

In the future, Yolanda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care product, and other groceries

loans.name: Annalie

texts.en:
Annalie is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Annalie is 48 years old and has two children who are in school.

Annalie has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines. Annalie requested a PHP 9000 loan amount through NWTF to buy sacks of rice to sell for her business.

Annalie has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Annalie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell for her business

loans.name: Zakayo

texts.en: This is Zakayo who is a middle man to buy farm produce in the farms and sell them in the Local market. He is married with three children. His dreams is one day to save enough money to buy his own farm where he will able to plant his own produce. The farmers are happy that the can transfer the cost of logistics to Zakayo . The output the receives he is able to take care of his family output. The Kiva loan will assist him to buy more produce to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy additional produce stock to increase his agriculture business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings

loans.name: Sabera

She has been practicing small-scale farming for the last 10 years, earning an income of KES 9,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her hope is to lead a financially stable life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Anonymous

loans.name: Elsa

Elsa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like rice, canned goods, eggs, personal product care and other groceries.

Elsa has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as coffee, juices, noodles, canned goods, soap and other groceries. 

In the future, Elsa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like rice, canned goods, eggs, personal product care and other groceries

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 59 years old and has three children. Erlinda is married and has one child in school.

Erlinda is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Erlinda requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Erlinda has been in this business for 12 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy toys for reselling by her husband.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a moto rickshaw's body for her husband's transportation services.

loans.name: Estella

texts.en:
Estella is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Estella is 39 years old and has five children who are in school.

Estella has a raising pigs business in the Philippines. Estella requested a PHP 9000 loan amount through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Estella has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Estella would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Silvia Consuelo

texts.es: Silvia de 40 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieto, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal desde hace 13 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan e su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de perfumes, lociones, cremas, shampoo, desodorantes etc. todo por mayor y así poder seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Silvia, 40 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own home with her daughter and grandson. She has worked selling personal care products for 13 years. Her business is located in her home. With the sales that she makes she manages to cover some of the household costs that arise.

She is requesting a loan to purchase perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc. all wholesale. This way she can continue with her work to have higher income.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc. all wholesale.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es:
Nieves, de 52 años de edad, es muy conocido por su excelente servicio a los demás, creció con sus padres quienes le formaron  y le dieron todo lo necesario para su educación, está casado y tiene 2 hijos. 

Nieves, se dedica a la albañilería desde la edad de 25 años, esta actividad la aprendió junto a su padre, quien le compartió todos los conocimientos sobre la albañilería, motivado por las ganancias que le genera dicha actividad ha decidido continuar con esa actividad, ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos; también su esposa le da un aporte económico a su familia, pues ella se dedica a la venta de leña.

Nieves, necesita el dinero para comprar materiales de construcción, pues se acerca la época de invierno y necesita hacer algunas reparaciones en el techo de su casa y mejorar las instalaciones donde almacenan la leña para posteriormente ser vendida a sus clientes, de lo cual reciben un ingreso extra.

Las metas que tiene Nieves a futuro son, tener una vivienda amplia e instalaciones más adecuadas para el almacenamiento de leña; también desea apoyar  en la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Nieves, 52 years old, is well known for his excellent service to others. He grew up with his parents who raised him and gave him everything necessary for his education. He is married and has two children.

Nieves has worked in masonry since the age of 25. He learned this work alongside his father who shared with him all of his masonry knowledge. Motivated by the earnings in said business, he has decided to continue with this work since it is his main source of income. His wife also provides financial support to the family since she works selling firewood.

Nieves needs the money to buy building materials since the winter season is nearing. He needs to make some repairs to the roof of his home and to improve the facility where they store firewood to later be sold to their customers, from which they receive extra income.

Nieves’ future goals are to have a spacious home and more appropriate facilities for storing firewood. He also wishes to support his children’s education.

loans.use: to buy building materials since the winter season is nearing and he needs to make some repairs to the roof of his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new cosmetics products such as facial cream, bleach cream, nail polish, hair color, lotion, etc. for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Juana Evangelista

texts.es: Juana de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cinco hijos, ella se dedica a la  venta de tortillas desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con sus ventas y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Juana, 41 years old, lives in her own home with her husband and their five children. She has worked selling tortillas for many years. Her business is located in her place of residence. With the sales she makes she manages to cover some of her household costs.

She is requesting a loan to buy lime and corn by the hundredweight in order to continue with her sales and to have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy lime and corn by the hundredweight.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 24 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, tiene una sala de belleza y barbería desde hace 2 años  ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra salir adelante, el joven vive en casa propia con sus padres y dos hermanas, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de productos para su salón de belleza como: talcos, shampoo, tijeras, cortadora de barba, entre otras cosas que necesita y así podrá obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
The young man, who has had his face pixilated for being 24 years old and living in a high risk area, has had a beauty salon and barbershop for 2 years. It is located close to his place of residence and he has many customers because of his good work.

He manages to get ahead with what he earns from working. He lives in his own home with his parents and his two sisters.

He is requesting a loan to buy products for his beauty salon like talcum powder, shampoo, scissors and hair clippers, among other things that he needs. He will be able to have better earnings that will allow him to have better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy talcum powder, shampoo, scissors and hair clippers, among other things.

loans.name: Vilma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Vilma, tiene una venta de plástico, al que cada día lo visitan nuevos clientes y se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar cacerolas, ollas, de aluminio y recipientes plásticos de mayor capacidad para atender las demandas de sus clientes, anhela que las demandas se mantengan para lograr mantener su constante progreso.
El financiamiento anterior le ha sido de ayuda para mantener mejor surtido su negocio, sus clientes están más satisfechos, su familia tiene el mismo núcleo y cuenta que hasta el momento no ha tenido dificultades en mantenerse trabajando.
texts.en:
Vilma sells plastic containers. New customers visit her everyday. She has decided to request a new loan to buy aluminum pots and pans and large capacity plastic containers to meet her customer’s demands. She hopes to maintain orders and manage to maintain her constant progress.

The previous loan has helped her to keep her business better stocked. Her customers are more satisfied, her core family is the same. She says that up until now she has not had difficulties in continuing to work.

loans.use: to buy aluminum pots and pans and large capacity plastic containers to meet her customer’s demands.

loans.name: Drissa's Group

texts.fr: Drissa qui se trouve sur la photo au premier rang à gauche, portant le chapeau, est membre d’un groupe de 8 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Konoko au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Drissa, âgé de 67 ans, est le père de 4 enfants âgés de 3 à 19 ans, dont 3 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés.  L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer a incité Drissa à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 55 ans. Il a mentionné que, "on peut connaitre une chose mais pas tout." Drissa cultive l'arachide, le mais, le coton sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agriculteur à des difficultés telles que le manque de matériels agricoles, d'engrais de qualité et de semences de qualité. Il a partagé que, "celui qui est assise est plus prudent que ce qui marche." Drissa entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrit en raison du système de paiement et des semences de qualité, ainsi que des engrais de qualité. Cette année Drissa effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences et d'engrais pour la culture de maïs afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.25 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 15 ans que Drissa cultive le maïs pour sa valeur vivrière et aussi pour sa valeur commerciale, car le maïs est un aliment qu'il vend sur le marché. Drissa planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de diversifier ses cultures et de pouvoir faire du commerce. Enfin Drissa espère aussi pouvoir couvrir les frais scolaires des enfants ainsi que construire une maison pour la famille
texts.en:
Drissa is the man wearing a hat and seated in the front row in the photo.  He is a member of a group of eight farmers registered with myAgro, who live and work in the village of Konoko, located south-east of Bamako, in Mali. Drissa is 67 years old and the father of four children whose ages range between 3 and 19.  Three of his children currently attend school. 

The family tradition is anchored in agricultural practice, an activity which constitutes the main source of income and provides food self-sufficiency for the family. For this reason, Drissa decided to become a farmer 55 years ago. Drissa says that "one can know one thing, but not everything."  He grows groundnut, maize and cotton on his plot of land. As a farmer, however, he faces challenges such as the lack of farming tools and of high-quality fertilizers and seeds.  He says that "a seated man is more prudent than a walking man."

Drissa is starting his first year with myAgro. He decided to join because of the payment system and the high-quality seeds and fertilizers.  This year, he will be making payments to purchase a myAgro package of OPV (open-pollinated variety) seeds and fertilizers to grow maize in order to increase his yield on his 0.25 hectare of land.

Drissa has been growing maize for 15 years now for its nutritional and commercial value, since he sells maize at the market. With his expected increased yield and income, he is planning to diversify his cultures and to expand his activity to the retail business.  In the end, Drissa also hopes to be able to cover his children's school fees and to build a house for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a package of seeds and fertilizers to grow maize, and to benefit from myAgro's farming technical training.

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es:
María es una joven trabajadora y emprendedora de 28 años, dueña de un negocio de productos Herbalife, que inició con ayuda de su esposo. Ella es madre de un niño y por el bienestar de su familia se esfuerza por prosperar en su negocio. 

Por lo cual, solicita un crédito para comprar productos Herbalife y hacer algunas mejorar al negocio. Esto le será de mucha ayuda porque podrá ofrecer variedad y en consiguiente a traerá más clientes e incrementaran sus ganancias. María planea abrir otro local.
texts.en:
Maria is a young and entrepreneurial woman, she is 28 years old, and owner of a business selling Herbalife products, which she started with the help of her husband. She is the mother of a boy, and she makes an effort to prosper in her business for the well-being of her family.

Therefore, she asks for a loan to buy Herbalife products and make some improvements in the business. This will be very helpful because she will be able to offer variety and will consequently attract more clients and increase her profit. Maria plans to open another store.

loans.use: to purchase Herbalife products.

loans.name: Domingo Gabriel

texts.es:
Domingo es un hombre de 40 años de edad, es casado tiene una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 14 y 19 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Santa Lucía Utatlán.
Domingo con el objetivo de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la albañilería, él tiene diez años de realizar esta labor, pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica a la venta de papas fritas.
Domingo está solicitando un préstamo para poder comprar sus mercaderías para su tienda de compra y venta de abarrotes tales como arroz, fideos, sal azúcar, golosinas y refrescos,  pues él cuenta que en estos momentos no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder realizar la inversión.
El gran sueño de Domingo es poder terminar la construcción de su casa para darle a su familia un mejor hogar.
texts.en:
Domingo is a 40-year-old man, he is married and he has a lovely family made up of three children between the ages of 14 and 19. This modest family lives in the community of Santa Lucia Utatlan. 
With the goal of obtaining an income and helping his family get ahead, Domingo works in construction. He has had this occupation for 10 years, but to improve his income, he also works in the sale of fried potatoes. 
Domingo is asking for a loan to be able to purchase merchandise for his store in the sale and purchase of groceries , such as rice, noodles, salt, sugar, candy, and sodas, as he says that at this moment he does not have enough money to be able to make the investment. 
Domingo’s big dream is to be able to finish the construction of his house to give his family a better home.

loans.use: to buy and sell groceries, such as rice, noodles, salt, sugar, candy, and sodas.

loans.name: Elvio Miguel

texts.es:
Elvio tiene 55 años de edad, vive al lado de su cónyuge en casa propia de material rústico en el Distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad donde la vida es muy tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercializacion de ganado porcino, los que cria en un corral ubicado en su domicilio, se dedica a esta actividad hace seis años por lo que cuenta con mucha experiencia en el rubro, sus animales los comercializa en su mismo distrito. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado porcino así como alimento para el engorde de estos, con ello obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elvio is 55 years old. He lives with his spouse in their own home, made from rustic materials, in the district of Pomahuaca. It is a community where life is peaceful and the residents work in agriculture and livestock. It is located in the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region in northern Peru. 

He raises and sells pigs. He raises them in a pen located by his house. He has done this activity for six years and has a lot of experience in the field. He sells his animals in the same district. The loan will be used to buy a larger quantity of pigs, as well as feed to fatten them. With this, he will obtain more income to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy  a larger quantity of pigs as well as food to  fatten them.

loans.name: Yahaira Aracelly

texts.es:
Yahaira es una mujer de treinta y seis años de edad, muy luchadora, salió a buscar el sustento para su hogar dado que su marido tuvo un accidente que lo imposibilito a laborar por un tiempo, fue así como inicio a vender productos nestle de forma ambulante, luego, el tener dos hijos menores, la llevo a buscar la forma de seguir trabajando y darle tiempo de calidad a su familia, fue así como decidió poner una pulpería en su casa. 
Esta perseverante mujer, ha sacado su negocio adelante con arduo trabajo, en estos momentos ella recurre a la ayuda de Kiva y MiCrédito para que se le brinde un préstamo que le permita comprar mercancía al por mayor tales como aceite, arroz, frijoles, azucar entre otros, obteniendo mejores precios, más ganancias y que su negocio se vea más surtido. En un futuro ella visualiza su pulpería como una miscelanea, además planea ahorrar para mejorar la infraestructura de su local, además de proporcionarles a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yahaira is a thirty six woman. She is really a fighter. She went out to seek a way to support her home because her husband had an accident which made it impossible to work for a time. That was how she decided to sell Nestle products as a street vendor. Later, with two minor children, she sought a way to keep working and have quality time for her family. That is how she decided to open a store in her house.

This persevering woman has gotten her business ahead with her hard work. At this time, she is turning to Kiva and MiCrédito for help with a loan that will allow her to buy merchandise wholesale, such as oil, rice, beans, sugar and more. She will obtain them at better prices and have ore profits and a better stocked business. In the future, she sees her store as a variety store. She also plans on saving to improve the infrastructure of her locale, in addition to giving her children a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale, such as oil, rice, beans, sugar and more.

loans.name: Percy

texts.es:
Percy tiene 26 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa familiar con su madre y su hermano en una comunidad tranquila donde la gente se dedica al comercio, ganadería y agricultura, se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cerdos, patos, gallinas, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 10 años por lo que cuenta con clientes fijos quienes dan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, con esto el espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que va a mejorar su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Percy is 26 years old. He is single and lives in the family home with his mother and brother in a peaceful community where people work as merchants, with livestock and in farming. It is located in the district of Zaña, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. 

He raises and sells small animals such as pigs, ducks, hens, and more. His business is located in his home. He has done this activity for more than 10 years and he has regular customers who give very good personal and work references for him. The loan will be to buy a lager number of animals as well as balanced feed to fatten them. With this, he hopes to offer a larger variety of animals to his customers, which will improve his income level and therefore his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger number of animals as well as balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es:
Emilia es una mujer de 45 años de edad, es soltero tiene una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 13 y 25 años, está hermosa familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Emilia para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica  a la agricultura, sembrando una variedad de verduras como papas, cebolla, ejotes, él tiene 20 años de realizar esta labor.
Emilia necesita un préstamo para poder comprar materiales como cemento, arena piedrín hierro, para construir un muro donde ella vive, pues ha considerado que es de mayor seguridad para su familia, porque ya se acerca la época de lluvia.
La esperanza de Emilia es poder construir el muro para sentirse más segura.
texts.en:
Emilia is a 45-year-old woman. She is single and has a nice family of three children from ages 13 to 25. This beautiful family lives in a community of Sololá.

Emilia makes a living in farming to earn income and provide for her family, planting a variety of vegetables such as potatoes, onions, and green beans. She has 20 years of this work.

Emilia needs a loan to be able to buy materials like cement, sand, gravel, and rebar to build a wall where she lives, as she considers that it's safer for her family since rainy season is approaching. Emilia's hope is to be able to build the wall to feel safer.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, and rebar to build a wall.

loans.name: Serapio

texts.es:
Serapio es un hombre que se encuentra muy satisfecho porque gracias al crédito al  que tuvo acceso en ADICLA él ha mejorado su negocio de compra y venta de cebolla y sus ingresos han mejorado, él ahora está solicitando un nuevo prestamo porque quiere incrementar su negocio comprando cebolla papas por cuerdas para venderlos en la plaza de su comunidad.
El gran sueño de Serapio es seguir superándose para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Serapio is a man who is very satisfied because, thanks to the credit that he had through ADICLA, he has improved his business buying and selling onions and his income has increased. Now, he is asking for another loan because he wants to increase his business buying onions and potatoes by the cuerda [plot of land 28 meters square], to sell them in the plaza in his community.

Serapio's biggest dream is to continue improving himself to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy and sell onions and potatoes by the cuerda [plot of land 28 meters square].

loans.name: Saul

texts.es:
Saul tiene 32 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyugue, cuenta con 3 hijos, tiene muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad, la misma que está ubicada en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú, esta comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Saul se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 5 años y con clientes fijos quienes brindan buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha, esto lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a permitirle mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Saul is 32 years old, lives in his own house made of basic materials. With his spouse, he has three children. He as a reputation of being hard-working in his community, which is located in the district of Pucará, province of Jaén, state of Cajamarca, located in the northern mountains of Peru. The people in this community basically make their living farming, raising cattle or trading.

Saul makes a living in agriculture, specifically in growing pineapples. He has five years of experience in this field and regular customers, who give him good references, both personal and work-related.

He will use this loan, when granted, for agricultural work: application and introduction of pesticides, fertilizer, and manpower for his harvest. This will help him to improve the physiology, morphology and productivity of his crop, and also to have a good harvest, hence a better production and a higher product quality, so he won't have problems to sell his product, and generate a better income, which will help him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: with agricultural work: application and introduction of pesticides, fertilizer, and manpower for his harvest.

loans.name: Jenner

texts.es:
Jenner tiene 39 años de edad, vive en el Distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad de clima caluroso donde la vida es tranquila y su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, está ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Él brinda servicios de arado con yunta, viene realizando esta actividad desde hace 8 años, adicionalmente se dedica a brindar servicios de transporte en mototaxi. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de un toro para arar mejor el campo y de esta manera ofrecer un mejor servicio, generar ingresos adicionales para una mejor calidad de vida de él y de su familia.
texts.en:
Jenner is 39 years old. He lives in Pomahuaca district, a community with a warm climate where life is peaceful and the population works in agriculture, trade, and animal husbandry. It is located in Jaén province, which is in Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru.  

He offers his services plowing land with oxen, and has been doing this work for 8 years. In addition, he works offering transportation services in a motorcycle taxi. He has asked for a loan to purchase a bull to plow the fields better and, in this way, offer better service, and generate additional income for a better quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to purchase a bull to plow the field better and, in this way, offer better service.

loans.name: Evert Lito

texts.es:
Evert Lito tiene 36 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyugue y su menor hijo, tiene muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad, la misma que está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Dicha comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agricolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha, esto lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto a un buen precio, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Evert Lito is 36 years old and lives in a house that he owns, made of basic materials, with his spouse and his young son. He has very good personal and work references in his community, which basically works in agriculture, animal husbandry and trade. This community is located in Pucará district, Jaén province, in Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. 

He works in agriculture, specifically growing pineapples, with 10 years of experience in this field. The loan that will be granted to him will be used in agricultural work, applying and incorporating phytosanitary products, fertilizer and paying labor costs for his crops. This will help him in the physiological, morphological, and productive improvement of his crop, and also to have a good harvest with the end of having better production and a better quality product, which he won't have any problems selling at a good price. This will allow him, in the short term, to improve his income, increase his earnings, and in the end, improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural work, applying and incorporating phytosanitary products, fertilizers and pay labor costs for his crops.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio es un hombre de 28 años, es casado tiene una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 2 y 7 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Santa Catarina Palopo.
Antonio para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica desde hace diez años, pero para mejorar sus ingresos también trabaja como jornalero en un chalet.
Antonio ahora ha considerado que es necesario solicitar un préstamo para poder invertirlo en su negocio de compra y venta de ropa típica como güipiles, cortes, fajas, porque lamentablemente él no cuenta con el capital suficiente,  y en su negocio tiene mucha demanda por tal motivo la decisión del préstamo.
El gran sueño de Antonio es poder contar con una tienda de compra y venta de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Antonio is a 28-year-old man, married and has a lovely family of three children between the ages of 2 and 7. This humble family lives in a community of Santa Catarina Palopo. 

To earn his income and get his family ahead, Antonio has worked buying and selling traditional clothing for the past ten years but, to improve his income, he also works as a day laborer at a private home.

Antonio has now considered that he needs to ask for a loan to be able to invest it in his business buying and selling traditional clothing such as güipiles [woven tops], cortes [woven skirts], and fajas [sashes] because, unfortunately, he doesn't have enough capital, and there is a lot of demand for his business, which motivated his decision about the loan.

Antonio's biggest dream is to have a store to buy and sell groceries.

loans.use: to purchase and sell traditional clothing such as güipiles [woven tops], cortes [woven skirts], and fajas [sashes].

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra es una persona dedicada a su labor y a sus estudios, quiere lograr su objetivo con ayuda de su familia y del apoyo de ellos. Sandra aspira  a seguir desarrollando sus conocimientos a través del estudio.
Ella está estudiando la licenciatura en ciencias contables, y quiere abrirse camino mediante su profesión.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas y seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Sandra is person with dedication for her work and her studies. She wants to reach her goal with the help and support of her family. Sandra aspires to further develop her knowledge after her studies.

She is studying for a degree in accounting, and wants to have better opportunities in her profession.

She is requesting this loan to pay for her tuition fees and continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria sigue estudiando la carrera de obstetricia, comenta que esta luchando por poder terminar sus estudios y el día de mañana ser una profesional reconocida que pueda ayudar a las mujeres en la hermosa labor de traer a sus hijos al mundo. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda y pudo seguir con sus estudios.
Maria quiere seguir luchando y es por ello que pide este préstamo, para poder cubrir nuevamente sus cuotas, y seguir luchando por cumplir sus sueños y anhelos. agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe que le sera muy útil y ella lo sabrá aprovechar.
texts.en:
Maria continues studying for her obstetrics degree. She says that she is working hard to be able to finish her education and in the future to be a well-known professional who can help women in the beautiful work of bringing their children into the world. She says that she used her previous loan to be able to pay her fees, which was a great help and she could continue with her education.

Maria wants to continue struggling onward and it is for this that she asks for a loan, to be able to again pay her fees and to continue struggling to fulfill her dreams and desires. She is grateful for this new opportunity that she is getting which will be very useful and which she knows how to put to use.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Wildor

texts.es:
Wildor tiene 36 años de edad, tiene hogar estable junto a su cónyuge y sus 5 menores hijos, reside en su casa propia casa en una zona rural del Distrito de Pucará, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha, esto lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Wildor is 36 years old, has a stable home with his spouse and his 5 young children, and lives in a house he owns in a rural zone of Pucará district, in a community which works in agriculture, trade and animal husbandry, located in Jaén province which is part of Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. 

He works in agriculture, specifically growing pineapple. He has 10 years of experience in this field and has asked for the loan to purchase phytosanitary products, fertilizers and pay labor costs for his crops. This will help him with physiological, morphological, and productive improvements for his crop, with the end of having a higher yield and a better quality product, so that he won't have any problems selling his product, which will increase his level of income and will give him a better quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase phytosanitary products, fertilizers and pay labor costs for his crops.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es:
Joel es una persona que esta poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder ser alguien en la vida para salir adelante y abrirse camino en la vida profesional, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en pagar la cuota de su universidad, lo cual le fue muy útil.
Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder usarlo nuevamente en el pago de las cuotas de sus estudios, ya que de es manera podrá seguir luchando y esforzándose como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
Joel is a person who is putting his best effort into being able to be someone in life to get ahead and make his way professionally. He says that he used his previous loan to pay his university fees, which was very useful.

He asks for another loan to be able to again use it to pay the fees for his course of study, since in this way he will be able to continue struggling and working hard as he has been doing. He is grateful for this new opportunity that he is getting to be able to grow and be someone in life.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana es de la ciudad de Caacupé, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería y comenta que quiere  ser una gran profesional y es por ello que está esforzándose mucho.
Quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas en algo tan importante como es su salud, es por ello que pone todo de sí. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de libros, y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Ana is from the city of Caacupé, studies for a career as nurse and says she wants to be a great at her profession, which is why she is studying very hard.

She wants  to help other people with something so important as their health, which is why she is giving everything she can. She is grateful for the opportunity she gets, as it will be a big help.

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in buying books, to continue her studies.

loans.use: to buy textbooks.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia vive en la ciudad de Luque en casa de sus padres, siendo ya una profesional  tiene como meta trabajar en su área a la cual dedicó muchos años de estudios, dando a la sociedad todo su buen desempeño como profesional, obtener buen ingreso y ayudar a su familia.
Ella está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas y comenta que con esfuerzo y sacrificio está terminando su carrera y podrá recibir su anhelado título. Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, ya que es un poco costoso y quiere poder cubrirlo.
Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de acceder al préstamo que le será de mucha utilidad.
texts.en:
Patricia lives in the city of Luque in her parents' home. She is already a professional and has as a goal to work in her field for which she dedicated many years of study, giving society all her good diligence as a professional to earn a good income and help her family. 

She is studying for a business administration degree and says that with effort and sacrifice she is finishing her program and will be able to get her desired degree. She asks for the loan to be able to pay for the costs of registering her degree, since it is a bit expensive and she wants to be able to pay for it.

She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to access the loan which will be very useful.

loans.use: to pay the cost of registering her degree.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina tiene 25 años, es estudiante de la carrera de Ingeniería Informática, pero actualmente está haciendo un curso para técnico en Mantenimiento, pues eso le generará ingresos extras en el trascurso de terminar su carrera.
Comenta que quiere aumentar sus conocimientos, ya que de esa forma podrá ser una buena profesional y ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y con ello poder cubrir sus gastos como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de crecer.
texts.en:
Carolina is 25 years old and a student of computer science. At the moment she is taking a course to be a maintenance technician in order to generate an extra income until she has finished her studies.

She says she wants to increase her knowledge and thus be a great professional and help her family and loved ones.

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay for her tuition fees and her expenses, as they arise. She is grateful for getting this opportunity to grow.

loans.use: to pay for her course fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fresh and seasonal fruits and an equilibrium scale for her husband.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for increased litres of milk supplied to clients daily to meet demand

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Josephine works hard to support her family. She has a raising pigs business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. 

Josephine is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock for her raising pigs business.

Josephine has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Diyagaya Group

texts.en:
Ester, who is in her late 30s, is married with one child who is still at school.  She has been running two projects, a food vendor and also has a general store. She works from 07 am to 9:30 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Esther's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to increase on the mamalishe and started the general store. She has paid back her loan successfully.  She used the profit to pay school fees, loan repayment and covered household expenses.  

She will use this loan to increase the general store inventory to meet her customer's demands. She dreams of selling her store product at wholesale prices.

Esther will share this loan with her loan group, DIYAGAYA, which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase the general  store inventory to meet her customer's demands.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 28-years-old single man from Khan Younis city. He has a factory for making kids candy especially jelly cups. He sell his products to the local supermarkets and grocery stores. It is a very good business and the demand is high. 
Alaa took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new machine for making jelly cups for his business. This will increase his productivity and also his income. 
Alaa appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new machine for making kid's candy jelly cups for his business.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es:
Diana es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería agroindustrial, por medio de la cual quiere convertirse en una gran profesional para poder ayudar a las demás personas.
Diana es una persona muy luchadora que se esfuerza por poder crecer y salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y con ello poder cubrir el gasto que tiene y poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Diana is from the city of Ybycuí. She studies agro-industrial engineering and wants to become a successful professional in order to be able to help others. 

Diana is a very hard-working person who strives to grow and to succeed. She is asking for a loan to pay her university fees. With the loan, she will be able to cover her expenses and to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan proviene de una familia trabajadora y humilde, que lucha por salir adelante, su meta es terminar sus estudios en  licenciatura en administración de empresas y luego estudiar marketing, para poder sobresalir y tener un ambiente de trabajo estable.
Él es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que está poniendo todo de sí para poder salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder seguir luchando por sus metas.
texts.en:
John comes from a hard-working and humble family who are struggling to get ahead. His goal is to finish his studies and get his degree in business administration and then to study marketing, to excel and have a stable work environment.

He is a very hardworking person and a fighter who is doing everything he can to succeed.

He is asking for this loan to be able to pay university fees and, by this, to continue striving to reach his goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and farm inputs so as to improve farming activity for a better produce for sale in the market and meet client and family needs.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is 63 years old, married, and blessed with four children. She is a farmer and has been growing cash crops to sell for more than 20 years. 

Martha will use the loan to buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use on her farm. She hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell. 

She plans using the anticipated profits to repay the loan and provide food for her family. Her future hopes are to improve her farming, make more income and support her family.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use on her farm and with the hope this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip, at heart, is a resourceful, loving man. His love has been enough to show him that he needs to work hard to help his siblings and parents get ahead with excellent values and education. 

Philip is a very hardworking, honest and dedicated farmer who hails from Kitale, a rural town in Kenya. He really loves and cherishes his family. Philip and his siblings work as a team supporting each other, and have practiced mixed farming for the past 10 years. 

Philip has an affinity for farming. Because of the liking that he has for farming, he has even nicknamed one of his cows, which makes him a very proud farmer, especially when he is milking his cows. Through his dairy cow, he is able to get between 5-10 liters of milk a day, and this helps him support his parents and siblings. 

Philip practices crop farming, but he has not been making good profits because of poor farming implements; that is why he is kindly seeking a loan to buy farm implements. 

Through the loan, he will be able to buy high-quality seeds, good fertilizer and pesticides that he will use to greatly improve his crop production. Modern farming requires the use of modern techniques, and therefore using high-quality seeds will assure him a bumper harvest and hence, increased profit levels. Philip is very visionary, and his goal for the season is to boost his crop production and be able to get more crop output than last year. All this can be achieved through lenders’ help and goodwill. 

Philip believes that through the loan, he will turn around his family life and be able to give his siblings a solid educational background. This loan will be Philip’s way out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy farm implements.

loans.name: Ruby

texts.en:
Ruby works hard to support her family. She is single with one child and has a rice retailing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy sacks of rice to sell.

Ruby has been in this business for five years now, and also earns additional income from a general store.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Ma. Leah

texts.en:
Ma. Leah is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Leah is 49 years old and has five children who are in school.

Ma. Leah has a personal care product business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items to sell like tea, herbal medicines, etc..

Ma. Leah has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like tea, herbal medicines, etc.

loans.name: Servenik

texts.en:
Servenik lives in Aghavnatun village of Armavir region with her son, daughter-in-law and two little grandchildren. 
Servenik, to sustain her family's living, is occupied in the farming business. She cultivates potatoes and cabbages and also has a beautiful grape orchard. 
She does her best to sustain her farm and gather income for her family. To improve her grape orchard and enlarge cultivation of grapes, Servenik needs some financial support. She asks this loan to purchase  fertilizer, pesticides and supplies needed for renovation of the grape orchard (wires and trestles). 

 As this is her first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The First-Chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products before because they have no credit history. Through this joint initiative, almost 500 borrowers like Servenik get a chance to have their first loans and develop their businesses. Servenik hopes for the lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, pesticides and supplies needed for renovation of the grape orchard (wires and trestles)

loans.name: Robert

texts.es:
Robert es una persona dinámica con ganas de alcanzar nuevos objetivos, emprendimientos con responsabilidad y trabajo. Su deseo es ser un profesional exitoso en la carrera de Economía y capacitarse cada día más.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder cubrir el gasto que tiene y seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Robert is a dynamic person with a desire to achieve new goals, and to realize projects with hard work and responsibility. His desire is to be a successful professional in Economics and to learn more each day.

He is asking for this loan to pay the university fees for his course, and with the loan he will be able to cover his expenses and to continue his studies as he has done before.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Porfiria

texts.es:
Porfiria es de la ciudad de Villarrica, está estudiando para poder ser docente, y quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas en algo tan importante como son los estudios de las personas.
Ella es una persona muy emprendedora que se esfuerza para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus cuotas, y con ello esforzarse por cumplir con su meta.
texts.en:
Porfiria is from the city of Villarrica. She is studying to be a teacher, and she wants to help others in something as important as their studies. She is a very enterprising person who strives to be someone in life.

She is asking for this loan in order to pay her fees, and by this to strive to meet her goal.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 49 years old, married, and blessed with two children. She is a farmer and has been growing cash crops to sell. 

She will use the loan from Vision Fund Kenya to buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm. She hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. Her future hopes are to improve her farming, make more income, and support her family.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm; she hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell to support her family.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita works hard to support her family. She is single and has a buy and sell bananas business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more bananas to sell in her food stall.

Rita has been in this business for three years now and would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Kouser

texts.en:
Kouser, aged 52, has been involved in an embroidered cloth-selling business for about 10 years. She buys a variety of printed and embroidered clothing from the main city market, and then sells it to the people of the local community. She has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to the family income. The summer season is going on and she wants to buy additional clothes for the summer season.

Kouser has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan to buy a stock of different clothes for the summer season by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she will be able to earn more income through greater sales. 

She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business. 

Kouser thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy summer season's clothing to sell by herself from home.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is a woman eager to get ahead. She is a 31-year-old mother who lives with her family in the Chuka area of Kenya. She is blessed with a lovely family that is her greatest motivation in life to persevere, because she wants to provide them with a better future. 

Jackline was unable to study to get a professional career because of the economic situation that her family faced. However, she never gave up and she has been practicing farming for the past eight years. She is an early riser who goes to her farm to earn a living. 

Jackline has space on her farm to use for dairy farming, so she respectfully requests a loan to buy a dairy cow. Chuka is an area that has a large population and there is a high demand for milk. Jackline, being an enterprising person, wants to take full advantage of that need and earn extra income. 

She hopes that this loan will allow her to change her standard of living and expand her milk-selling business. Jackline plans to open a very large milk-selling business in the nearby shopping center and to package milk. She wants to be economically empowered. 

She knows that accessing funds is challenging, but with partners such as Juhudi Kilimo and Kiva, she feels relieved to know that all her dreams will be achieved and she will be able to provide a secure future for her children and improve her family's living conditions. Jackline patiently awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela está estudiando para poder sacar a su familia adelante, desea llegar a su meta de licenciatura  en ciencias de la educación, para tener  más trabajo y así tener un mejor  ingreso para tener una vida mejor.
Ella está esforzándose para poder abrirse camino y el día de mañana ser una persona reconocida en su trabajo.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas y seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de ser alguien en la vida y crecer como persona y profesional.
texts.en:
Mariela is studying to get her family ahead. She wants to reach her goal to obtain a degree in Education, in order to get more work and to have a better income for a better life.

She is struggling to make her way to become a person recognized for her work.

She is asking for a loan to pay her university fees and to continue with her studies as she has done before. She is thankful for the opportunity she gets to become someone in life, and to be able to grow personally and professionally.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es:
Adolfo es de la ciudad de San Pedro, está cursando el último año de la Carrera de Ingeniería Agronómica. Comenta que su sueño es terminar su carrera para poder trabajar y ayudar a su familia.
Adolfo está poniendo todo su esfuerzo para poder crecer y ser alguien en la vida, una persona profesional que ayude a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Adolfo is from the city of San Pedro. He is in the final year of studying Agricultural Engineering. He says his dream is to finish his career in order to work and help his family.

Adolfo striving very hard to grow and to be someone in life, to become a professional who helps others. 

He is asking for this loan to be able to pay his university fees and to continues his studies as he has done before.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, ellas son unidas y solidarias entre ellas, trabajan juntas en actividades, están luchando por mejorar sus vidas y dar a sus seres queridos todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
La Sra. Luz es la presidenta del grupo, ella se dedica son su marido que cuenta a un taller de moto, son una pareja muy trabajadora que con esfuerzo y lucha están sacando adelante a sus hijos. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora, que poco a poco ha ido creciendo y mejorando.
 La Sra. Luz solicita este préstamo para invertir  en la compra de repuestos para moto para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, así contar con más clientelas. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
This group is from the city of San Ignacio. They show unity and solidarity, they work as a team, and they are tenacious about improving their lives and offering their loves ones all that was not available to them.

Luz is the president of the group. She and her husband have a motorcycle repair shop. They are a hardworking couple, striving and providing for their children. Luz, an enterprising woman, has been growing and improving little by little.

She is applying for this loan to buy motorcycle spare parts, so that she can meet her clients' demands and increase the customer base for the business.

Luz is grateful for this opportunity to grow the business and help her family.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve her farming activity through application of modern farming technologies for more income so as to improve family living standards.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To increase her fruit stock and lease a stall

loans.name: Kivandini Adult Education Centre Group

texts.en:
Wayua is the name of the lady raising her hand in the photograph; she is a member of Kivandini Adult Education Centre group. She is 50 years old and a mother of four children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa (HiH EA) in the year 2012 in order to benefit from the trainings especially enterprise development.

She operates a kiosk and is borrowing Kiva loan to buy more foodstuffs so as to add stock to her kiosk for increased income. This will enable her pay for the basic necessities of her family, e.g. food and clothing. 

Wayua is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial support.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs to add stock to her kiosk for increased income to pay for her family's basic needs, e.g. food and clothing.

loans.name: Ashot

texts.en:
Ashot is a teacher by his educational background, working in a local village school in Akhuryan village, Shirak region. He lives with his wife, 10-year-old daughter, and 87-year-old father. Ashot's two sons serve in the army. 

To sustain his family's living, Ashot, as the only worker in the family is also engaged in agriculture. His wife is the big support for Ashot to run the farming business. They cultivate potatoes in the arable land near their house and that is a very important source of income for the family. 

Ashot has applied for this loan to purchase two tons of potato seeds to enlarge potato cultivation and gather income for the family's living. 

Because the region where Ashot's village is located is considered poor, and the unemployment rate there is very high, people face numerous difficulties in developing their businesses. Ashot's loan has been approved within the joint initiative between SEF and Kiva, which provides loans to the under-served population of the Shirak region to help them to access the market and earn a living.

loans.use: to pay for two tons of potato seeds to enlarge potato cultivation and gather income for family's living

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 43 years old, married, and blessed with five children. 

She has been a farmer for the last ten years and it has been profitable. She will use the loan from Vision Fund Kenya to buy farm inputs such as hybrid seeds and fertilizer as well as farming tools for use in her farm. 

She hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell. She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her future hopes are to expand her farming and support her family.

loans.use: To purchase farm tools and inputs to use in her farming activity for a better harvest to sell to be able to support her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her husband's transportation services.

loans.name: Hiba El Kmatiyeh Group

texts.en:
Nour El Houda is the featured borrower for Hiba El Kmatiyeh Group. She got along with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and lives at the same time.

Nour El Houda is a 19-year-old single lady who works as a hairdresser from her house to cover her needs and expenses. Nour El Houda is an ambitious and independent lady who is working hard to develop her business; thus, today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to start a new business of selling accessories as a second source of income. 

Nour El Houda is the second lady on the right of the photo. With respect to the other group members, Diana is the first lady on the left; Diala is the second lady on the left; and Jihan is the first lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to start a new business of selling accessories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new motorized rickshaw for her husband's transportation service.

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally works hard to support her family. Sally is single with one child. She has a food-vending business in the Philippines.

Sally requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

Sally has been in this business for four years now, and also earns additional income from a flower shop.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and farm tools so as to meet client and family needs.

loans.name: Wilson Andres

texts.es: Andres es un joven trabajador, tiene 21 años de edad, Andres vive con su madre y sus abuelitos, Andres  trabaja al jornal ya que su madre le enseño a trabajar en la agricultura  desde que él tenía 14 años. Andres necesita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de abono y fungicidas para curar sus cultivos ya que cuando llueve es necesario fumigar muy seguido para que los cultivos no se dañen. Si le sigue yendo bien en la agricultura  Andres tiene la aspiración tener buenas ganancias y con este dinero comprar un terreno donde pueda sembrar sus alverjas y no tener de pagar arriendo.
texts.en:
Andres is a young worker at 21 years of age. He lives with his mother and grandparents. He works for wages as his mother taught him to work in agriculture since he was 14. 

Andres requests a loan to invest in the purchase of fertilizer and fungicides to treat his crops. When it rains, it’s necessary to spray often to prevent the crops from being damaged. If he continues to do well in agriculture, Andres aspires to have good profits. With this money, he hopes to buy land where he can to plant peas and not have to pay rent.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicides

loans.name: Khatoon

texts.en:
Khatoon is 34 years old; she is the mother of six children.

Her husband owns a firewood stall, in which he sells pieces of wood. He sells firewood mostly to the chef who cooks meals for ceremonies and events. He purchases wood and cuts it into pieces with a splitting axe. In his area, consumers have to face a lot of shortfall problems of LPG gas. This is the reason people like to fire this firewood for cooking. Nowadays, a lot of gas load shedding is going on, and the demand for firewood has increased as well. He wants to buy wood to cut into small pieces to sell.
